190a3('dul ba): phab pas des ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng g.yogs med par btse bar mi bya'o// 
190a4('dul ba): sgo khang dang / khyams su 'tsheng bar byed pa dang / btse ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang dang / khya mas su btso bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na
190a5('dul ba): rung ba'i gnas kyi gzhir/ mi rung ba'i bcu po 'di dag/ ste/ 'di rnams su zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ steng g.yogs med pa dang / sgo khang dang / 
190a6('dul ba): khyams dang / bsro khang dang / khrus khang dang / rgyal po'i gnas dang / mchod rten gyi gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag gi gnas dang / dge slong
190a7('dul ba): ma'i dbyar khang ngo // bzhi bcu po 'di dag ni rung ba ma yin pa gnas kyi gzhi yin te/ de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// zhal ta byed na 'gal tshabs can du
190a8('dul ba): 'gyur ro// sdom ni/ nang bu can dang zas dag dang / g.yar chus lhag pa dag dang yang / tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang / 
190b1('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na/ dge slong nang bu can zhig yod pas des sman pa la dris pa bzhin bzangs dag kho bo la sman ston
190b2('dul ba): cig/ des nad kyi gzhi dris nas smras pa/ 'phags pa thugs pa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang / 
190b3('dul ba): ngo / sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas/ 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yong ngo // des skabs de dge slong
190b4('dul ba): rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa dal ba/ gal te sman pas thug pa 'thung shig ces
190b5('dul ba): zer na/ sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya/ ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o// 
190b6('dul ba): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i nang g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no// de nas sman pas 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin
190b7('dul ba): bzangs mi bde'o// ci khyed kyis thug pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo'o// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// sang ni dron mo gsol
190b8('dul ba): cig/ de nas de'i nang g.yog gis blangs nas grang mo kho na rnyed nas/ des de bsros te byin no// de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa/ mi bde'o// ci thug
191a1('dul ba): pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig grang mo zhig bsros nas so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis// de grang ste bsros pa
191a2('dul ba): las kyis/ ngas ni rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzod de gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis/ 'bras dang snong sta gon byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung zhig
191a3('dul ba): tu btse bar brtsams pa las/ de nas kha'i rtug pas/ de ma rung bar byas pas/ dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis ni bcom
191a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ rung ba'i gan nas bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas
191a5('dul ba): bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang / ji tsam pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/ 
191a6('dul ba): rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtong ba'i mtha' can dang / ba nyal ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bskos pa'o// de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong
191a7('dul ba): lag gi blas nas rtsom pa na/ der mthog mar bzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyis rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes sems bskyed cing / tshig tu smras pa ste/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i
191a8('dul ba): mtha' can zhes bya'o// sems gtod ba'i mtha' can gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas der thog mar rje ba 'deg pa na/ nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ cho
191b1('dul ba): ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i nges par zung shig/ nges par zung shig ces bya ba ste/ 'di na sems gtong ba'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// banyal
191b2('dul ba): blta bu gang zhen/ gang la sgo tha dad par gsas pa ste/ 'di ni banyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o// gnas stong pa gang zhe na/ spangs pa'i gnas te/ 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o// 
191b3('dul ba): bskos pa gang zhe na/ gsol pa dang / gnyis kyi las bsgos pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsko ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang
191b4('dul ba): zhig thams cad zin par byas pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la/ dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o// bsgo ba yang 'di
191b5('dul ba): ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+DI badz+ra/ ngas te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang ga par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun
191b6('dul ba): par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gcig gis gsel ba byas te/ las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / 
191b7('dul ba): phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge
191b8('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o// 'di ni gsol pa'o// la
192a1('dul ba): ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol te
192a2('dul ba): 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed de/ de'i slad dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang
192a3('dul ba): dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dzem gang dang
192a4('dul ba): bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar ba zong pa de dag ni cang mi gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod
192a5('dul ba): cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyi sa lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol te/ 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung
192a6('dul ba): ba'i gnas su skos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su skos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du
192a7('dul ba): btses pa dang / mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa
192a8('dul ba): can na sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nyen kor na gnas pa rnams kyis/ de'i tshe ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas/ de yang za bar byed do// gang gi tshe nges bcom
192b1('dul ba): ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ mi za bas khyer te 'ongs na yang dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do// dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang / mu stegs can rnams
192b2('dul ba): sbesmad par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ shes ldan dag sde dpon seng ge'i ched du byas te/ sha khyer te 'ongs na ni/ des de dag ma zes la shAkya'i sras kyi
192b3('dul ba): dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi ched du byas pa'i sha ni zos so zhes bya ba'i skabs de dag dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
192b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ngas gnas gsum gyi das rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gas dngas pa gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ched du byas par med
192b5('dul ba): sum du mthong ba/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi ba 'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las khyod kyi tshad du byas pa yin no zhes pa thos pa/ rung ba ma yin pa'i
192b6('dul ba): sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / rang nyid gi blo las rnam par rtog pa skyes pa tshul las 'dini bdag go ched du byas pa yin na snyam du rung ba yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o nas/ 
192b7('dul ba): gsungs pa yin no// dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha babar bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi ched du byed par mngon sumadus
192b8('dul ba): mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las 'dis khyed kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsung ba dang
193a1('dul ba): bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa tshul las 'di bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam pa ma skyes pa rung ba'i sha bzar
193a2('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no// // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong
193a3('dul ba): ngag lcogs par gyur pas de rnams glos pa bste 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la/ 
193a4('dul ba): ci'i slad du glos pa ba ste bzhugs shing / dge ba'i phyi gsal brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis sna sa pa/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bsod
193a5('dul ba): snyoms lto 'drangs par ma rnyed pas/ kho bo cag ltogs te nyam chung bas nges na glos pab ste 'dug go/ rnams kyis smras pa/ ci ste zhal chus mi gsol/ btsem
193a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
193a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge slong rnams kyis
193a8('dul ba): gise chus bapa' bar byaste/ 'di la 'gyong bar mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ 9/ 
193b1('dul ba): slong rnams la bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod
193b2('dul ba): snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang bza' bar 'dod na/ 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
193b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod na/ sngar blangs zin to snyam du sems la sngar rnyed
193b4('dul ba): pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i
193b5('dul ba): dus byung nas/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang ba rna mas kyis dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du za sa la mgron du bos nas/ de rnams kyis zos pa dang // 
193b6('dul ba): bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so// bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ched du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyi snoms te bzhud la
193b7('dul ba): phyis gsol cig/ de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo // dong nas de yang bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / 
193b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin pa yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la
194a1('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o// / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i
194a2('dul ba): dus byung na/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams la mgron du bos te/ de rnams kyis zos nas/ bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag
194a3('dul ba): ste/ dge slong rnams dong ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la yongs su btang ba lags te/ 'tshal
194a4('dul ba): te mchis la/ khyed kho na la dbul lo zhes de rnams kyi/ das khyer te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams de la yang za bar 'dod na/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs
194a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa/ 
194a6('dul ba): 'di lta bur/ sngar yongasu btang ba'o snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// // gleng gzhi na
194a7('dul ba): mnyan yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis nub phyogs kyi tshal na yong ba'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ de rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba
194a8('dul ba): yin pas/ 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas spang ba byas pa rnams la de dag byin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no/ 
194b1('dul ba): 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe/ mu stegs
194b2('dul ba): rnams la yon gnas bgying ba las/ da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas/ khyed rnams kyang nga ni yon gnas su gyur pa lags na/ gal te khyod kyis ma bzhes na
194b3('dul ba): ci bdag cag gi dge ba'i shul rgyags dang bral te/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar bgyi 'am/ de lta bas na thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de
194b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyi dar rjes su gnang ste/ rnyed dka' ba yin no snyam bsams
194b5('dul ba): nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyed par mi bya'o// de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/ dgun 'brum dang / bal be se'u dang / 'brag go dang / 
194b6('dul ba): sbyar rga dang / yon tshe dang / shing tog ur man dang / shing tog u ru ma yi/ shing tog ni ko tsa dang / shing tog pa b+hu dang / shing tog sin ci ka'o// 
194b7('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang / chu nas skyes pa dag phul ba dang / dge
194b8('dul ba): slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
195a1('dul ba): srul pa/ rnyed dka' ba yin no snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyed par mi bya'o// de la chu nas skye ba ni 'di dag yin te/ 
195a2('dul ba): ud pal dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / ku mu da'i sa bon dang / pad+ma'i sa bon no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyems pas khrag dang badra/ 
195a3('dul ba): kan 'khrugs par gyur to// rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bdag rang gi blos ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gre byas kyi
195a4('dul ba): lan 'ga' yang sman pa lam dris kyi/ ma la bdag dgos dri'i snyam nas/ des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs mtshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bdaka
195a5('dul ba): 'khrugs par gyur na/ de'i sman ston cig/ des skye sa pa/ 'phags pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'am stsol cig/ dang ses par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa me 'dugs
195a6('dul ba): gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba bal pa'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams nas/ 
195a7('dul ba): ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ngal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
195a8('dul ba): pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dges pa ci zhig gi phyir byen/ ngas
195b1('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan la khrugs nas/ de la sman pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to// klu'i rgyal po'i rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags
195b2('dul ba): pa gal te de lta na re shig bzhes shig/ de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs mi'i tshad tsam gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gton cing bsten cing / pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i mdab ma'i skye
195b3('dul ba): ra gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa me'u gal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa la blta bar brtsams pa dang / 
195b4('dul ba): de nas klu'i rgyal po rab bstan gyis smras pa/ 'phag/ sa pa ci gzigs pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol ba dar bzhed dam/ de cing mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / smras
195b5('dul ba): pa dang / 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung bzed bkang ba khyer nas ngal
195b6('dul ba): gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin te// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
195b7('dul ba): bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur
195b8('dul ba): cig bskur nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du seng la/ gtsug lag khang gi khyim gyi mdun du zhog la shog/ de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i thus/ mnyan
196a1('dul ba): yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas pad+ma'i rtsab rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas/ slar log pa las
196a2('dul ba): lam gyi byed na tshal gyi bal glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na bal glang mo de las bal glang drug gu cog 'ablangs te/ 'brangs pa'i mong la
196a3('dul ba): seng ge'i sgra 'byin to// de nas bal glang mo de skrag pas gcin rtug gtor nas/ bal glang phrug gu bor te bres so// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'o shing mkhan zhig
196a4('dul ba): shing gi ched du tshal du song ba las bal glang drug gu de mtsho dang nas/ khyim bdag du blangs bsnyun gses pa/ skyed de/ nor gyis bskyangs pas/ ming ner
196a5('dul ba): skyong nor skyong zhes bya bar grags so// kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyong skyes su bskur ba las de mnyan yon
196a6('dul ba): kyi yul na gnas pa la skye bos nor gyis bskyangs pa na nor bsgreng zhes 'don to// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pas zos/ kha cig ni tshe dang ldan
196a7('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bus kha cig ni dge 'dun la brims pa las 'on kyang lhag par gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas nas kyang za 'dod na bdag cag gis spang bar
196a8('dul ba): bya'o zhes ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa
196b1('dul ba): brnyed par dka' bas de'i phyir rjes su gnang ngo // pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ del 'gyod par mi bya'o// 
196b2('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / 
196b3('dul ba): lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mo'o// khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar ji ltar shes she na/ gal te bang mdzad stong
196b4('dul ba): pa rnams la bltas na/ mthong ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so// lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na
196b5('dul ba): des gcig gi don du snod du btses pa ni brgya stong gi bza rab 'byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bu ni ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i rkang pa la lnga brgya
196b6('dul ba): ba'i snod btags te 'dug la/ des gang gi tshe brgya 'am/ stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug gi
196b7('dul ba): bu ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du dri sbyar na/ brgya stong khyed par 'gyur te/ lug gi mna' ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi/ 
196b8('dul ba): bran 'a dzi lta bu zhe na/ des gang gi tshe zhing la ril cig rmos bde tshe/ zhing la rel bdun mos par 'gyur te/ de lug gi bran be ni de lta yin no// dug gi bran me
197a1('dul ba): ltar na bsod nams che bar shes zhe na/ de gang gi tshe gang tsam drus pa de'i tshe/ bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na
197a2('dul ba): lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
197a3('dul ba): bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs
197a4('dul ba): gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong b.radaspro ba de ni/ chos gos rnams long shig ces de sgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe
197a5('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer
197a6('dul ba): bzang byed du gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni ches gos rnams long
197a7('dul ba): shig/ tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor du
197a8('dul ba): ba dang / zhi ga/ 'khor zhi ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang / ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yong/ 
197b1('dul ba): du tshe 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams mtha' 'a kho du dong ba las/ de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas gnas pa de rnams kyis dge slong
197b2('dul ba): ge'u tu ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rod rong por gyur nas/ bdag cag sngon ni dge sbyong go'u tams yul dbus nas sprugs so// de gal te 'dir 'ongs na gden mi za
197b3('dul ba): bar bdag cag 'di nas spyugs par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig pa sham par bya'o snyam mo// de rnams rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig
197b4('dul ba): chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag de ci lag/ sa/ shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis 'gro'o// ci'i slad du re shig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum chogs
197b5('dul ba): pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis/ ji srid rgud pa ma mtha nga ba de'i bar du 'deng ngo // 'phags pa dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes
197b6('dul ba): ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing / du ma zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo // 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar
197b7('dul ba): bzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig/ ma bzhud cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag
197b8('dul ba): kho bo cag gi nyan mi btub bo// 'phags pa dag gsungs shig/ mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye
198a1('dul ba): bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas byung la/ grong khyer bzangs byed kyi nang du chud cig/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni rjes shig 'dus
198a2('dul ba): gnas rnams ni shig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni ched cig/ chu rnams ni dug lugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gzhugs shig
198a3('dul ba): dang thams cad bgyi'o// de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du bcud de/ 
198a4('dul ba): rwa sngon pa rnams ni brngas/ 'dug gnas rnams ni bshog/ me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam sa ni bcang / rgyun mas ni drug thugs so// de nas
198a5('dul ba): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ ma ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa byed pa yal b.rador ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom
198a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ 
198a7('dul ba): nge 'jig rten thams cad meng ba'i yul stong du rgyu zhing gshegs pa bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bde ba la reg par
198a8('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/ des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu laM bsgo ba/ song lo chu dug can rnams skems shig/ char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bul bsgre ba/ 'di rnams kyis
198b1('dul ba): bsgoms pa dang / khyod kyis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas khong shig/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams la yang bsgo ba/ khyed kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor
198b2('dul ba): duganas thob shig/ de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu dug can rnams bsnams so// char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus ni der yong chu yan lag brgyad dang ljon pas
198b3('dul ba): bkang ngo po/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas btab nas/ long sgo rnams 'byor cing rgyas par gyur te// mu sngags
198b4('dul ba): can rnams kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshi ga/ so rnams bsregs nas/ de rnams kyis rtog/ sa chen dag mongags te ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltas
198b5('dul ba): shig/ de rnams dong ba las/ ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas/ sla ra 'ongs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag ljongs 'di lta bur
198b6('dul ba): 'byor cing rgyas pa ni sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo // mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/ re shig gang zhig
198b7('dul ba): sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang bsgyur bar byed pa des/ khyed cag bskur bar mi byed pa de lta srid re snyan// khyed cag rnam pa thams cad du bltas zin te blta ba'i mtha'
198b8('dul ba): ma byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig/ khyod cag la dge sbyong go'u ta maso ci zhig bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ 
199a1('dul ba): khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ ci ngas khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam 'am/ mu stegs can
199a2('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ ngam zhig bcas te/ gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong ge'u ta ma la lta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing / gang zhing 'gro ba de la chad par kar sha ba na drug
199a3('dul ba): cus bcang bar khrims 'cha' na 'dug go/ de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis
199a4('dul ba): grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas/ bzang byed kyilho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe serare skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu me grong khyer bzang byed du bag/ 
199a5('dul ba): mar po tang ba desar ba'i kha na 'dug pas/ bcom ldan 'das mun khang na bzhugs pa mthong nas nges pas mas pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dgo' bar
199a6('dul ba): mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas/ rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na/ bdag mar me thog la 'babs
199a7('dul ba): bzhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chudang nas/ them skas zhig sprul to// de nas de snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / khatu dga' bas mar ma thogs
199a8('dul ba): te them skas las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me bzhag nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos byag
199b1('dul ba): byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i
199b2('dul ba): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lag so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 
199b3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod tshur sheg khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / de la ngan re nang med par gyur cig/ 
199b4('dul ba): ces smos la 'di skad ces kyang smros shig/ khyim dang dag khyod kyi cheng kho na rang 'dir 'ongs na/ khyod sgo ba cang nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de
199b5('dul ba): lta bur bya ba de cig rigs sam/ gal te tshogs kyi sa khrims su bca' bar byas so zhes smras pa dang / khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa/ 
199b6('dul ba): des gal te brgya'am/ stong 'god par btang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing / yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na/ khyod kar sha ba na drug cu byin nas 'ong mi nus sam zhes smras
199b7('dul ba): shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas chas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tsher ba de ltar byin
199b8('dul ba): gyis brlabs nas/ khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la nad med par gyur cig ces gsungs so// des smras pa/ 
200a1('dul ba): bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i ched
200a2('dul ba): du nga'i 'dir gshegs na/ khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyed byed pa de lta bur bya ba cig rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyis khrims
200a3('dul ba): su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o// gang zhig 'gron de tshegs kyis kar sha pa na drug cu'i chang bas bcang ngo zhes so// khyim bdag bcom
200a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i rkang pa na dam lnga brgya pa'i snod cig gtags te 'dug pa/ des dgal te brgya 'am/ steng 'gong par btang na gang ga
200a5('dul ba): nar 'gyur zhing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na/ kar ban drug cu byin nas/ khyod 'ong bar mi nus sa ma zhes gsung ngo // des bsams pa 'di ni sus
200a6('dul ba): kyang mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gre'o snyam nas/ des kar sha pan drug cu sgor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i tham skas
200a7('dul ba): las 'bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der sengs phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 
200a8('dul ba): chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag yug gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags
200b1('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshangad ba mdzad de/ khyim bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
200b2('dul ba): sum du byaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang
200b3('dul ba): cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyed la brten nas phal cher kun gyis
200b4('dul ba): 'thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag lu dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mtsho/ dpes phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
200b5('dul ba): song ste/ de khyim du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kar/ ba na'i phung po gcer te/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chagaso sbyin
200b6('dul ba): bcom rtsod med pa// mtshungs pa med pa gser gyi mdog can blta 'dod pa// de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byas la// myur tu dengs shig de yi ner ni kho bos
200b7('dul ba): gzhal/ skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te/ 
200b8('dul ba): de lta na tshegs kho nas khrimasu bcas pa/ tshogaso kho nas bshig tu zad med/ 'di rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsam so// de nas phan tshun sngos pas
201a1('dul ba): 'byung bar ma nus pa dang / gnod sbyin lagan rdo rjes 'dus pa'i skye bo la snying brno ba'i dring du 'phags pas rab dra nas/ srag
201a2('dul ba): chags brgya stong du ma kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig no sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo // de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas/ bcas
201a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun chad 'khor bar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung
201a4('dul ba): gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ sems can du mngag gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsi ba sbeng bar byed pa'i chos bshang ba mdzad de/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni/ 
201a5('dul ba): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes bya kha nas/ kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong
201a6('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam bong brkyang ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dun rig/ 
201a7('dul ba): tu chos bshad pas/ gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// khyim bdag lug gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol bcom
201a8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// des gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung bci lags/ bcom ldan
201b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mar dang / bur ma dang / hwags dang / sha kha ra dang / btung bdag go// de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste/ smras pa/ 
201b2('dul ba): shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so// des nas khyim bdag lug gis
201b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i gtung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
201b4('dul ba): khyim bdag lugs 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa na mas la so sor bkod / ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo/ tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du btul te gshegs/ 
201b5('dul ba): bon/ khyim bdag yug gis gsol pa/ bcom lda na 'das shul gyi snyun rgyags kyi zong kar sha ba na dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
201b6('dul ba): ba/ blang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom
201b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba byed pas so// rung ba byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
201b8('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul len pa gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
202a1('dul ba): dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor ngas
202a2('dul ba): 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi/ mi blang ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'i/ blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o// khyim bdag lug gis
202a3('dul ba): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma/ 
202a4('dul ba): shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyi dam pa'am/ dge tshul med na/ dge slong gis zhe dge bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang nyid
202a5('dul ba): kyis bkur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyi sa brlab par bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas
202a6('dul ba): sbyin len byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol
202a7('dul ba): bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sman 'di dag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab bo zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// 
202a8('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyi sa zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis buram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// zhes gang
202b1('dul ba): gsungs pa su zhig gis 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa dang / spung ba byas pa dang / nang pa dang dge skos dang / 
202b2('dul ba): lag gi blas so// dge slong ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis/ 'bras dang / phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las/ lam gyis ngal nas/ bza' bar 'dod nas/ 
202b3('dul ba): 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas des zas kyi bya ba
202b4('dul ba): byed mi nus pas/ 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yi/ ngan pa de sprugs nas bza' bar bya'o// bya rnams gang yin pa de chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o// kha cig
202b5('dul ba): zhu bar gyur pa de bkrur ma rung ste/ zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ pa/ skug ma'i tshal pas bzhar la chus bkru bar
202b6('dul ba): bya'o// 'on kyang zas med par bkru ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par gsal te/ chu'i nang du mnyes la btung bar byas nas/ de tshags
202b7('dul ba): kyis btsags la btung bar bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
202b8('dul ba): ldan 'das khyim bdag dang / lug gi mchis brang dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi gna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na de drug
203a1('dul ba): bsod nams chen por gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas/ 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyas
203a2('dul ba): par bgyis kyi/ ma mnyes par ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags 'a tshogs rnyeng pa nas
203a3('dul ba): bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ bA ra na se'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal
203a4('dul ba): srid byed du 'jug go/ de'i cha bA ra na se'i grong khyer du daltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi'i dbabs pas/ thur mas 'tshe ba'i mu ga chen po 'thung
203a5('dul ba): bar 'gyur ri zhes lung bstan to// mu ge rnam po gsu/ ni zam tog dang / rus gong dkar po dang / thur mas 'tsho ba'o// de la bam tog ces bya ba ni/ ma
203a6('dul ba): tog do'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag blugs te/ ma las pa'i sems can rnams kyi cheng du bzhag nas/ bdag cag shin 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur snyam pa
203a7('dul ba): ste/ 'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel bas za ma tog ces bya'o// rus gong dkar po gang zhe na/ dus ngan mi rnams kyis rus pa dag bsdus nas re shig bcos te/ ji tsam na rus
203a8('dul ba): pa de dag dkar por gyur pa dang / de nas de'i khu ba 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni rus gong dkar po dang 'brel pas rus gang dkar po zhes bya'o// thur mas 'tshe ba gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams/ 
203b1('dul ba): kyis g.yul gyi ser gnas/ 'bru'i 'brum bu dag thur mas brus nas/ chu mang po'i snod du bcos nus 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni thur ma dang 'brel bas thur mas 'tshe ba zhes
203b2('dul ba): bya'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis bA ra na ser dri sgrogs su bcug pa/ bA ra na sa na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer ba dag nyon cig/ ltas mkhan rnams lo bcu gnyis
203b3('dul ba): su char mi 'bab pas/ za ma tog dang / rus gong dkar po dang / thur mas 'tshe ba'i mu ge 'byung bar lung brtan gyis/ khyed las gang dag lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod
203b4('dul ba): pa de rnams ni 'khod cig/ gang dag la med pa de dag ni/ dgar dga' bar dang la/ mu ge med cing lo legs dpar gyur nas slar sheg shig/ de'i tshe na bA ra na sen/ 
203b5('dul ba): khyim bdag byug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/ des ma ngan bkug ste/ smras pa/ kye nang rje kho bo 'khor dang / 
203b6('dul ba): bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ dpon po mchis so// de de nyid na gnas pa las/ mu ge de lo brgyud ma kho nar byung bas/ de'i bang mdzod
203b7('dul ba): rnams yongs su zad pas/ 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad shi bar gyur te/ bdag nyid dang drug cig lus so// de nas khyim bdag nges pang mdzod rnams phyags pa las/ 'bras
203b8('dul ba): bre'u chung gang zhig byung nas/ de chung mas snod du blugs te btses so// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas
204a1('dul ba): gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhi
204a2('dul ba): song ba dang / pU ra na ser phyin nas/ snga gro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thegs te/ bA ra na ser bseng snyoms la zhugs pa na/ khyim bdag dris kya
204a3('dul ba): bza' bar bsdogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de yang rims bzhin du bsod snyoms la rgyus nas/ de'i khyim du byin to// khyim bdag des de lus mdzes shing sems dang / 
204a4('dul ba): ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ 2/ di bdag gis zos kyang gdon mi za bar srog dang 'gro rnal 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gi skal pa rab tu byung ba
204a5('dul ba): 'di la sbyin no snyam nas/ des chung ma la smras pa/ zang mo kho bo'i skal pa ni rab tu byung ba 'di la dbul lo// des bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim thab mi za na/ bdag
204a6('dul ba): gis ci ste bza' snyam nas/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi skal pa yang 'di la dbul lo// de bzhin du bu dang / mna' ma dang / bram po dang / bran mos kyang dpyad nas rang rang gi/ 
204a7('dul ba): skal ba yongs su btang ste/ de nas de thams cad 'dus nas// rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul lo// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyis/ tshig gis ni
204a8('dul ba): ma yin pas des nga ba'i rgyal po mdab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam kha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin
204b1('dul ba): cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtong ba yin pas/ shing rtsa ba nas bcad de 'gyel ba bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas
204b2('dul ba): smon lam ci 'ded par gdab par rtsom ste/ khyim bdag gis smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ 
204b3('dul ba): bdag gis gal te bang ba dang / bang mdzod stong pa dag la bltas pa na/ mthong ba de'i mod la gang bar gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i tshe sa rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par
204b4('dul ba): du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ chung ma das smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa
204b5('dul ba): 'di lta bu la bya ba byas bla'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gi gal te gcig gi don du snod du bces pa de brgya 'am/ stong gis zos kyang / ji srid bdag gis
204b6('dul ba): sbyor ba ma btang ba'i bar yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang theb nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi
204b7('dul ba): mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bus smon lam btab pa bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis rked pa la
204b8('dul ba): lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa/ gal te brgya 'am/ stong 'gong par btang yang gang ba nyid du 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos
205a1('dul ba): rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par
205a2('dul ba): gyur cig/ mna' mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te
205a3('dul ba): gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbar na/ des brgya 'am/ stong byugs kyang ji srid kyang spor ba ma btang gi bar du zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 
205a4('dul ba): 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnye des par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgying ba dar gyur cig/ bran pos smon lam btab pa/ 
205a5('dul ba): bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba bya sa pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te zhing rol cig rmos na rol bdun rmos par
205a6('dul ba): 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur
205a7('dul ba): gyur cig/ bran mos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te snod gang
205a8('dul ba): tsam drus pa gang yin pa des/ snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par
205b1('dul ba): bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ 
205b2('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste 'dug pa las/ de rdzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grib ma rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi steng
205b3('dul ba): dubyab nas/ des gyen du blta bar brtsams pa las/ rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bshel chen po yang su zhig gi
205b4('dul ba): bkren po'i drungs byung bar gyur snyam mo// de nas khyi ram bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod dang / bang mdzodarnams la bltas pa dang / ji tsam na gang bar mthong ngo // 
205b5('dul ba): des chung ma la smras pa/ re shig kho bo'i smon lam ni/ rdzogs par gyur gyis/ nga khyed cag gi blta'o// / de nas bran mes 'bras snod gang tsam drus na bdun tsam
205b6('dul ba): du 'phel bar gyur te/ chung mas gcig gi don du snod du btses pa la de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug nye 'khor gyi srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas
205b7('dul ba): zes kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag des bA ra na sar dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shes ldan dag khyad cag la su zhig ci don du gnyer ba de shig shog
205b8('dul ba): bA ra na ser sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen por byung ba rgyal pos thos nas/ ngas smras pa/ shes ldan dag sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/ blon po rnams
206a1('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig ces bgyi bas mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye ba lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ga
206a2('dul ba): gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye 'am/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag de khug cig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / 
206a3('dul ba): de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zan pa de'i tshe/ khyim gyi mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye 'am/ lha su'i mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye/ 
206a4('dul ba): 'on kyang de ring kho nas bon stsal ba'i 'bras bu de ring nyid du grub lags so// rgyal pos spros pa/ de ji lta ba zhig/ des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos
206a5('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag nyid chen po de la bsod snyoms phul lam/ lha bdag gis phul lo// de yang lhag par dang bar gyur nas/ tshigs su bcang bas
206a6('dul ba): smras pa/ kye ma'o yon tan las byung ba'i// skyon kun rnam par spangs pa'i zhing / de las sa bon btab pa yi// 'bras bu deng nyid thob par gyur// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems
206a7('dul ba): khyim bdag dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma dang / khyim bdag gi bu dang / khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang / khyim bdag gi bran po dang / khyim bdag gi bran mo gang yin pa de ni/ khyim
206a8('dul ba): bdag lug dang / khyim bdag lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug k+ki mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mo 'od dag nyid yin no// 'di dag gis rang
206b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas drug chur yang bsod nams chen por gyur cing / nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong zhing / rang
206b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byas kyis/ mi mnyes par ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa'i rnam par
206b3('dul ba): smin pa ni cig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin pa zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par
206b4('dul ba): bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// / sdom ni/ dke ne'i bu yis btung ba blangs// ka shi'i tshong rdal nas
206b5('dul ba): thug dang / sdig can du ni bca' ba dang // 'gyod dang sbru ra ba'i zas ngag go/ bcom ldan 'das yul u du/ ma'i gnas ni bzhugs so// de'i tshe drang srong ko'u na'i bu
206b6('dul ba): gnas pa'i yul u du mi'i gnas na 'dug go// nyin parare ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ngas gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
206b7('dul ba): rnams la chos bshad na/ der ngas tshegs chung ngus drang srong ke'i na'i bu thul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas rdzing bu dal gyis
206b8('dul ba): 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad na/ der thul bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ chos nyid kyis gang gis tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
207a1('dul ba): rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs srung ba de'i cha/ brgya byin dang / mangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgong ba
207a2('dul ba): sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyeng ba mdzad/ bltas na
207a3('dul ba): bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rig nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen la bsgo ba/ lnga rtsen song la/ rdzing bu dang / 
207a4('dul ba): kyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan shom des te/ 'dun mchen po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i me drangs/ 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar drang srong ke ne'i bu
207a5('dul ba): srungs ma gcig kyang skos shig/ des rdzing bu dal rgyu sa 'bab kyi 'gram du drang srong ke na'i bu'i srungs ma bzhag nas gnas shom par rtsom pa nad na skye bo'i tshogs
207a6('dul ba): chen po'i ca co'i sgra byung ba dang / de nas drang srong ke ne'i bu ca tse'i sgras langs nas/ srungs ma de la dris pa ca tse'i'o sgra 'di ci zhig/ des smras pa/ gang na shom par byed par
207a7('dul ba): byed pa'o// ci kho bo'i phyir ram/ khyod kyi phyir ni ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir yin no// khyod 'di ni ci zhig la sdong / khyod kho na srung ngo // 
207a8('dul ba): ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po 'du bar 'gyur bas so// des smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de su zhig srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig
207b1('dul ba): srung / bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i srungs ma mdzad do zhes byas pa dang / drang srong ke ne'i bus thos nas cang mi smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dran
207b2('dul ba): bza' sham thabs mnabs te/ lhung bzed dang tshes gos bsnams nas/ u du mar bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ u du mar bsod snyoms sprad nas/ zas kyi bya ba mdzad
207b3('dul ba): de zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag ni/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu u du ma nas ma snang bar gyur te/ rdzing bu
207b4('dul ba): dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du byon par 'gyur ba de lta bu da'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bdan
207b5('dul ba): ba shams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen bo yul 'khor skyeng dri za du ma'i 'khor dang dri za bar+g+ha brag du ma'i 'khor dang dri za stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang dri za
207b6('dul ba): brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i nor bus thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas
207b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas shar phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ rgyal po
207b8('dul ba): chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma'i
208a1('dul ba): 'khor dang / lha'i mu tig gis thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song na/ byin pa dang / bcom ldan
208a2('dul ba): 'das la lha'i mu tig gis btor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas
208a3('dul ba): lho phyogs su brten te 'dug go// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya stong phrag
208a4('dul ba): du ma'i 'khor dang / lho'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dang / da pa rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gangan
208a5('dul ba): bder song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'o/ tog ud pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / dkar po dang / man dar ba rnams kyis gtor nas/ ca
208a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas/ nub phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ rgyal po
208a7('dul ba): chen po rnams thos kyi bus kyang gnod sbyin du mi'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i
208a8('dul ba): 'khor dang / lha'i dbyig dang / gser gyis thub bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ni ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbyig dang / gser gyis gter nas/ 
208b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun bltas nas/ byang phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ de
208b2('dul ba): kha dbus pa'i rigs ni gnyis yin te/ yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po'o// mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/ mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu'o// 
208b3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad na/ gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni mi shes la/ gal te/ 
208b4('dul ba): mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad na/ gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni mi shes pa das/ ma la ngas gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig gis chos
208b5('dul ba): bshad do// gnyis la ni mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gi sa ba shad do snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po
208b6('dul ba): 'di ltar lus zhig pa dang / tsher ba gsil bar gyur pa dang / 'du shes 'gag pa dang / 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang / rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa de nyid
208b7('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal ba na/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i dri za brgya stong phrag du ma chos
208b8('dul ba): rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de la khyed kyis
209a1('dul ba): mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa tsam du gyis shig/ chos kyi
209a2('dul ba): rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
209a3('dul ba): dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rgyal po chen po/ e na/ me ne/ dab bye/ da Dab pa/ 'di/ 
209a4('dul ba): nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mig / mi bzang dang / de dang bskal pa mnyam pa'i klu brgya
209a5('dul ba): stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal ba/ de ltar
209a6('dul ba): na rgyal po chen po/ mA ShA/ tu ShA/ sang shA mA/ sarba tra bi rA DI/ 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos
209a7('dul ba): kyi bu dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ da ni bdag
209a8('dul ba): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la khad kyis nyen/ su la bstan pa btad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ gal te lha rnams lan ni lha rnams bag med pa la dga' ba mang
209b1('dul ba): bas yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'on te mi rnams la na ni mi ni tshe thung ba yin pas de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyis/ ma la ngas lha dang mi rnams dang / dge/ 
209b2('dul ba): slong 'od srung la gtad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongasu mya ngan las
209b3('dul ba): 'das pa'i bstan pa shar phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang lce phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po
209b4('dul ba): chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen dpe khyod kyis kyang nub phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgya dal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
209b5('dul ba): po khyed kyis kyang byang phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ de na sa rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ ba com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda/ 
209b6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi lags so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong nas zhabs
209b7('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi bya ba rnams gtad nas/ 
209b8('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang / bstan pa'i don gyi bya ba la brtson par gyis shig/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom
210a1('dul ba): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam
210a2('dul ba): bar smin pas rgyal po bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid
210a3('dul ba): kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsregs pa tshegs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag
210a4('dul ba): sngon byung ba/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams dkyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od
210a5('dul ba): srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po na klu gnyis shig gnas pa/ dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs char 'byin
210a6('dul ba): ne/ shing shal ma brtsegs pa na yang na mkha' lding gnyis shig yod pa/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang gtsug gi dbang phyug go/ gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin
210a7('dul ba): gnyis la/ de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe/ de gnyis sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis yang dag
210a8('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spun sngar skyabs su song zhing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang / de gnyis la na mkha' lding gis gnod par bya bar brtsams pa las/ 
210b1('dul ba): ri rab la rlung dang / chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas/ slar log pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni kho bos cag gis khyed cag la gnod pa byas/ 
210b2('dul ba): na/ sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ da gang gis na khe bo cag khyed dang phrad nas ri rab la rlung dang / chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ dbugs
210b3('dul ba): 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams
210b4('dul ba): blangs so// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta/ dar bdag cag gis kyang blang ngo zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ yang dag par rdzogs
210b5('dul ba): ba'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar dong nas/ de dag phyi na pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'a nga srung gi spyan snga nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag gis
210b6('dul ba): chos de thos nas/ deng ba de dog de gnyis mthong nas/ na mkha' lding de gnyis kyis/ klu dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/ 'gro ba pa ba'i ngag su yin
210b7('dul ba): de gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang / nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar na bdag cag gis kyang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs
210b8('dul ba): su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa smon lam gdab pa zhes de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gon
211a1('dul ba): rnams blangs so// dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni slar blangs so// de nas ldan cig 'dus nas yang dag par rdzogs pa
211a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar chas ma
211a3('dul ba): nas/ bden pa mthong ste/ rang gi gnas su mchis pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs
211a4('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la/ bram ze'i khye'u deskye dgu rnams kyis tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshes
211a5('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kye thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa bcom ldan 'das des kyang de bzhin du rdzing bu dal gyis
211a6('dul ba): 'bab kyi 'gram du bdag cag la chos bshad de/ bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong ste/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su mchi bar gyur cig ces byaso// dge
211a7('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ klu dang na mkha' lding bzhi po gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bzhi po gang yin pa de dag nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dbugs 'byin gang yin pa de
211a8('dul ba): ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no// dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no// 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ni mig mi bzang yin no// gtsug go dbang phyug ni
211b1('dul ba): rnam thos kyi bu yin te/ de'i tshi kun 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar srub su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs shing / sman
211b2('dul ba): lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing / nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // chos
211b3('dul ba): bshad pa drang srong ke'u na'i bus thos nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / 
211b4('dul ba): bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos nas mod la drang srong ke na'i bus pags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas/ phyir ma
211b5('dul ba): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshang ba mdzad do// de nas de rtogs pa'i dang / dang ldan par gyur nas/ btung ba brgyad po co tsa'i btung
211b6('dul ba): ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang / rgya shug gi btung ba dang / a shwa tha'i btung ba dang / u dum ba ra'i btung ba dang / rtsub 'gyur gyi btung ba dang / 'bra go'i btu
211b7('dul ba): ba dang / rgun gyi btung ba khyer to// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa btung ba brgyad po 'di dag
211b8('dul ba): ni sngon gyis drang srong rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na ni
212a1('dul ba): bul thugs brtse ba'i nye bar dgongs nas/ btung ba brgyang po dag bzhes so// bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
212a2('dul ba): slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su sbyin len byas/ dus su mnyes/ dus su btsag so// dus su byin gyis brlabs na/ dus su longs spyang bar bya zhing / dus ma yin/ 
212a3('dul ba): par longs spyad par mi bya la/ nam gyi thun dang po thal nas longs spyad mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus byin len byas la/ dus ma yin paro mnyes/ dus ma yin par
212a4('dul ba): btsags dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa na/ lo das spyad par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/ dus su mnyes/ dus ma yin
212a5('dul ba): bar btsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs ba ni longs spyad par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad / paM 'di dag dus ma yin par sbyin len byas la/ dus ma
212a6('dul ba): yin par mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags pa ni/ zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyang bar mi byal/ nam gyi cha stong 'das na yang longs spung bar mi bya'o// de nas drang srong ke na'i bu sten
212a7('dul ba): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa de leg su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcos
212a8('dul ba): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshed sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong ke na'i bul cang
212b1('dul ba): mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ stan las langs te song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu dal gyis/ 
212b2('dul ba): 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu u du mar gshegs so// de nas drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas/ nang
212b3('dul ba): mi rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhengs shig/ bzhin bzangs dag longs shig/ shing dag gshegs shig/ me bus shig zhal zas dag gral bar gyis shig/ 
212b4('dul ba): bkang sa dag byi dor gyis shig/ de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i da sring mo'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya bas de nyid du nub mo gnas btab pa las drang srong ri bos/ drang srong ke na'i bu
212b5('dul ba): nam ma langs par langs nas/ nang mi rnams la smra bzo sa so// thos nas kyang drang srong ke na'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// drang sro ci khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyong ba/ 
212b6('dul ba): rnams 'gron du bos sam/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'am/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs sam/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa
212b7('dul ba): yongasu rdzogs sam/ des smras pa/ ri bo kho bo ni tshangs po mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gren du nges pa yang ma yin/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bze sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma
212b8('dul ba): yin// pho brang 'khor nas gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang ma yin/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongasu rdzogs pa yang ma yod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
213a1('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan pas so// des sangs rgyas b+hi ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa zos nas/ bsdurnams cad zing zhes bye nas/ 
213a2('dul ba): gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa drang srong sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ ri bo dge sbyong go'i tu ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dgos
213a3('dul ba): te dang ba yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ ro ba sangs
213a4('dul ba): rgyas zhes bya ba ni de yin no// ri bos smras pa/ drang srong dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ drang srong ke ni'i dbus smras pa/ ri bo rgyal rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang
213a5('dul ba): skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas meng par rab tu byung ba ma nga yod/ bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / 
213a6('dul ba): dmangs rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi rjes su rab
213a7('dul ba): tu byung ba yod de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o// ri bo dge 'dun 'di dag sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag
213a8('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun 'ang kho bos gdugs tshed la spyan drangs so// de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa 'drin pas nang bar sngar langs te/ 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan/ 
213b1('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ri bos
213b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob pa ltan
213b3('dul ba): bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyang par bgyi'o// drang srong ri bo 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs
213b4('dul ba): pabar dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga dgug de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyis kyi nub mo nas gtsang
213b5('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas btabs shing tshim par byas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
213b6('dul ba): 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na/ ri bo rab tu byung ba mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ri bo khyod rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung ngo // legs par byas so// shin tu legs par byas so// kho/ 
213b7('dul ba): bo yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin/ rab tu byung ngo // de nas drang srong ke ne'i bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnam grangs
213b8('dul ba): du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lags nas bslabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur
214a1('dul ba): par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das
214a2('dul ba): kyis de la yon bsngos pa dang / chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so// de nas drang srong ke na'i bus rgyu lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i chos byas nas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang / 
214a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ drang
214a4('dul ba): srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa
214a5('dul ba): dge slong gi dngos pos thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par dbyung bar bgyi'o// drang srong ke na'i bus 'khor lnga brgya dang / legs par gsungs
214a6('dul ba): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhes bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong
214a7('dul ba): po de dang / 'bab chu rab tu bzang mo'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze kab phyin
214a8('dul ba): la dge slong lnga brgya gtad de// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya lnga bcu btang ngo do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa
214b1('dul ba): bram ze ka pi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
214b2('dul ba): bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// dge slong rnams the tsom
214b3('dul ba): skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni/ shes rab che ba rnams
214b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'ung gal gyi bu chen po ni mthu che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog tu lags na/ 'on dgrang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phi nas/ gdams ngag pheg pa gang
214b5('dul ba): lags pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags pa de dag na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
214b6('dul ba): gang dag lags pa de dag ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar du ma zang / ji ltar
214b7('dul ba): 'das pa'i dus na yang ka phi na'i gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi
214b8('dul ba): khams dang / shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na drang srong gnyis shig gnas te// 
215a1('dul ba): se sor 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nang de gnyis la gcig shinas/ de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba/ 
215a2('dul ba): sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde bas gdungs nas phan tshun 'byin 'phyan nas/ drang srong cig shes de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / des de rnams mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas dris pa/ bram
215a3('dul ba): ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyi mkhan po gar song / nges bsams po/ bdag 'das na bram ze 'i bye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar
215a4('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/ des de rnams dbugs phyung ste bsdus so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de yang nad kyis thebangs par gyur nas/ de'i slob ma mchog gsum yod pa
215a5('dul ba): la des gcig la lnga brgya/ gnyis pa la nyis brgya lnga bcu/ gsum pa la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu gtang ngo // de ni 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to// de la lnga brgya/ 
215a6('dul ba): gtad pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/ nyes brgya lnga bcu gtang ba gang yin pa des ni/ ji ltar gzugs kyi khams pa
215a7('dul ba): bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go// nyis brgya lnga bcu phog pa cig shos kyis ni ji ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkong ba de ltar gdams ngag pheg go// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// 
215a8('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ka pi na 'di nyid yin no// nyis brgya lnga bcu gzugs kyi khams la rab tu 'god/ 
215b1('dul ba): pa gang yin bden dge slong mo 'dugal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no// cig shes kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lngal rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yinan/ 
215b2('dul ba): 'on kyang dge slong ka pi nas gdams ngag theg pa gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po rnon pa yin no// mo'u dgal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa dbang po 'bring po yin no// shA ri'i bu'i gang dag
215b3('dul ba): yin pa de dag ni dbang po rtul po yin no// gal te shA ri'i bus gdams ngag ma phog par gyur na/ de dag gis dro bar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// ke na'i bu ni ral ba can// 
215b4('dul ba): ji ltar sangs rgyas bsngags brjod pa// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// thams cad 'thun par mnyan par dgyis// ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni// dus gcig cig ni
215b5('dul ba): ston pa po// dpa' chen nyan thos thabs gcig tu// gdu gas tshed la ni spyan drangs so// ka na'i bu yi khyim du ni// zas kyi zhal ta byed pa dag/ bram ze ri bos mthong gyur te// 
215b6('dul ba): mthong nas ke na'i bu la dris// bag ma len tam 'on te ci// rgyal po yul 'khor 'gron pos sam/ khod kyi mchod sprin che dus sam// dris pa de ni bdag la smos// bdag ni bgam
215b7('dul ba): mi len la// rgyal pos 'am yul 'khor 'gron ma pos// bdag gi sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog/ gdugs tshe nga la ni spyan drangs so// ri bo sangs rgyas sgra thos nas// yid skye
215b8('dul ba): pa ni skyes gyur te// sangs rgyas de ci ke na'i bu// dris pa de ni bdag la smos// shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa yi// ston po gang zag zla med yod// de ni chos kun blo ldan pas/ 
216a1('dul ba): de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// 'dus byas 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i chos// 'das pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la// de bzhin ma 'ongs pa
216a2('dul ba): gzigs shing // da ltar byung ba rnams kyang gzigs// mngon shes bya ba ji snyed pa// de kun rtogs pas thams cad rig/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de bas
216a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// mngon par shes bya mngon shes byas// bsgoms par bya ba rnams kyang bsgoms// spang bar bya rnams spangs paso nas// de bas sangs rgyas zhes
216a4('dul ba): bya'o// gang zhig bltam par gyur pa na// rgya mtshor/ ri bor bcas pa yi// sa 'di rab tu gso mdzad ga/ de la thal sbyar bag 'tshal lo// gang gis bdud dang
216a5('dul ba): nag po yis// rtsa lag bzhin bcas btsem nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// bA ra na se'i grong bzhud nas/ 
216a6('dul ba): gang gis rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i// chos kyis 'khor lo de bskor ba// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis 'dod chags bcing bas bcings// 'dod chags zhe sdang gis
216a7('dul ba): gdungs pa'i// sems can mang po grol mdzad pa// de lathal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig/ rnam 'dren de ni ji srin// shAkya'i sras pa'ong
216a8('dul ba): mdzangal// de rong nyid nas skyabasu 'gro/ tshal sdug yid du 'ong ba // gang na par ni bram ze'i chos// dri zas rgyal ba lta bu mi// sa sa rgyas tha meng mthong bar 'gyur/ gan pa/ 
216b1('dul ba): dur smrig 'od ldan de// gser 'od nyi ma'i 'od zer can// de bzhin gser ni bcom yi// gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin// sal shing gi me tog dang // kar ni/ 
216b2('dul ba): me tog 'dra// rin chen sna tshogs spras pa yi// rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no// n+ya gro d+ha lta bur ni// chu zheng gab par gyur pa dang // khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyis ni// 
216b3('dul ba): kun nas snang ba dag tu mdzod// rgyal srid rgyal dang nye dur bcas// 'dod pa kun dga' spangs nas ni// rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba'i// thob pa dben pa rnams la dgyes
216b4('dul ba): spos dang ldang ba'i seng ge ni// nags su 'jigs pa demeng ba ltar// seng ge lta bur bsnyengs med gsung das// bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// zhal
216b5('dul ba): 'dzum 'jam pa'i gsung dang ni// tshangs pa'i gsung dang snyam pa'i gsung // rnga yi sgra yi gsung lta bu'i// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba dag pa
216b6('dul ba): nam mkha' la// rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa// nam pa'i
216b7('dul ba): ngos la mdzes pa lta'i// sangs rgyas mun dang bral gyur cing // mdzes par bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar byung ba'i khyu mchog no// nog dang ldan pa'i g.yog gnas ldan
216b8('dul ba): skyes bu khru mchog stobs bcu ldan// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'i// chu chen tshod gzung med pa lta'i// sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa/ 
217a1('dul ba): yi mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bla meng mthong // nag po'i phyogs las nges byung ba'i// nyi ma mkha' la gsal ba dang // me yi phung po 'ag/ 
217a2('dul ba): blta'i go'u tam sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'khor lo sgyur rgyal po// zham ring byed pa'i yongs bskor ltar// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// dgra bcom
217a3('dul ba): rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes// 'dod pa rnams la dbang sgyur dang // ji ltar tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams// thub pa dbang ni sgyur bar mdzad/ 
217a4('dul ba): gang thos nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal mtsho chen de las sgrol ba// sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang // sdug dbasngal kun 'byung gang yin dang // sdug bsngal nye bar
217a5('dul ba): zhi ba dang // lam ni yan lag bzhi tshan gnyis// sbrang rtse mi bskol ro lta bu'i// bden pa dag ni rab tu 'a chang// nor meng rnams la nor sbyin zhing // nang pa rnams
217a6('dul ba): kyi dpyad kyang mdzad// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs gyur pas// skye dgu sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad// mun par gyur pa'i sems can dang // blun po lam gel rgyu ba dang // bde ba
217a7('dul ba): mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// lam gyi drang po rab tu ston// 'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar bzhin// gti mug rab 'bar skye dgu rnams// ji ltar sprin chen char 'bebs ltar// thub pa
217a8('dul ba): chen pos zhi bar mdzad// gzugs dang kha dog stobs ldan pas// de dang 'dra ba yong ma yin// sku mkhregs stobs mchog ldan pa ni// ri bo bzhin du shin tu gnas// rnyed dang ma
217b1('dul ba): rnyeng bde sdug dang // spang ba dang ni bstod pa dang // grags pa dang ni ma grags pas// chu yis pad+ma bzhin ma gos// srog gcong pa ni rnams spangs te// ma byin pa la dga' mi byed/ 
217b2('dul ba): bden pa gsungs zhing tshangs par spong // de ni phra ma spangs pa yin// tshig rtsub dag ni mi gsung zhing // dus su bab par mjam po gsungs// de ni 'dod la brnab sems meng // skye
217b3('dul ba): bo rnams la de sems byams// yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs// ting nge 'dzin stobs spyod yul ba// bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la
217b4('dul ba): gshegs// lha dang mi yi sgra dag ni// gang yin rnam pa sna tshogs gsan// nyon mongs can nam dge yang rung // pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen// gang dang gang du sngon
217b5('dul ba): gnas pa// sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang // sems// can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi// 'chi 'pho dang ni skye ba mkhye// na// zag bzad cing mi ldan pas// nyer zhi shin tu mya
