270b8('dul ba): yongasu rdzogs nas lus rdul gyis yig cing mchis pa lag so// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de lan thob shig/ rgyal po chen po dper na/ 
271a1('dul ba): khyod la 'dir shar phyogs nas yid mi ches pa yid brtan du rung ba brtan pa 'dzin rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces lha bdag bzod
271a2('dul ba): 'di nas shar phyogasu mchi na/ de nas bdag gis ri brag chen po ma chag pa/ se ra ka ma mchis pa/ phrag ma mchis pa/ shin tu khregs pa cig tu skrag pa zhig sa'i bar dang / na mkha'i
271a3('dul ba): bar gyi sems can thams cad dang / srog chags thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma ji snyed pa thams cad phye mar glog
271a4('dul ba): cing mchi ba mthong gis lha khyed kyi bgyi ba'am/ sgrub pa gang lags pa de mdzod cig ces zer la de bzhin du lho daphyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas mi zhig
271a5('dul ba): 'ongs te bya ba nas bgyi ba 'am/ sgrub pa de mdzod cig/ zer te/ rgyal po chen po 'jigs pa chen po'i yang na po/ ma bzang bar byed pa mi gzad pa de lta bu nye bar
271a6('dul ba): gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa ni rnyed par dka' na khyod kyi ci zhig bya/ btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po mi bas par bgyid pa/ mi bzang ba de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa
271a7('dul ba): rnyed par dka' ba lags pa/ don spang ba dang / chos spang ba dang / bsed nams spyang pa dang / dge ba spang ba dang / bzang po spyang pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snyan pa la brtson par byed pa ma
271a8('dul ba): lags par gzhan zhig bgyir mchos/ rgyal po chen po khyod ci'i phyir 'di skad ces btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu'i zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan
271b1('dul ba): pa la brtson par bgyi/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// btsun pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs
271b2('dul ba): bar ba ba ste/ gnas pa de rnams kyis glang po che rnams dang / glang po cher 'gyed pa dang / rta ba rnams dang / rta bar 'gyed bdang / shing rta pa thams cad dang / shing rta par 'gyed pa dang / dpung / 
271b3('dul ba): bu chung rnams dang / dpung bu chung ngu 'gyed pa dang / gsang tshig mkhan rnams dang / gsang tshig mkhan du 'gyed pa dang / nor rnams kyis nor bu brgya pa tha dad ba gang lags pa de dag thams
271b4('dul ba): cad de'i tshe 'gyeng pa'i 'bru ma mchis pa dang / stobs ma dmachis pa dang / pha rol gnon pa ma mchis pa lags pas / de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces btsun pa 'jigs pa chen sde
271b5('dul ba): yang chen po de lta bu nye bar gnas na zhes bya ba nas sas/ sa rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi ba lags pa ra zhes mchi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// rgyal po
271b6('dul ba): chen po de bzhin du srog chags 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rga ba dang / 'chi bas 'joms pa yin no// rgyal po chen po de ltar rga ba dang / 'chi bas 'joms pa na/ skyes bu gang zag
271b7('dul ba): gi don spang ba dang / zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bya ba ma yin par gzhan ci zhig byar yod ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
271b8('dul ba): tshigasu bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar che zhing rgya che ba// ri bo na mkha' las 'ongs pa// kun nas yang dag 'ong ba yis// sa ni phye mar klog pa na// de la glang po ches mi rdzi// dpung bu chung dang shing
272a1('dul ba): rta dang // rtas min gsang tshig mkhan pa ni// nor gyi 'gyed pas rgyal mi theb// de bzhin rga dang 'chi ba yis// mi rnams 'joms par byed pa ni// rgyal rigs blam
272a2('dul ba): ze rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs gdol ba g.yung ba dang / tshul khrims 'tshal dang tshul khrims ldan// khyim pa de bzhin rtul zhugs can// lang tshe nyid dang rgan po dang // de bzhin bar ma'i
272a3('dul ba): mi rnams dang // cung zad kyang ni 'dzem meng bar// thams cad mngon du 'joms par byed// de lta bas na mkhas pa'i mi// bdag gi don la lta ba yis// sangs rgyas chos dang ngage 'dun ni// bla mang
272a4('dul ba): ngag la dad bya zhing // lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis// dam pa de'i chos ni spang byas na// 'di na smang bar mi 'gyur zhing // ma the ris seng nas dga' bar 'gyur// de nas ko se la'i rgyal po/ 
272a5('dul ba): gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos byug byas te/ stan las langs
272a6('dul ba): nas song ngo // dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gams las ci zhig bgyis na/ las
272a7('dul ba): de'i rnam par smin pas/ sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la de rnams las kyang bu be sum cu gnyis byung ste/ rtsal po che thub brlag pa sha stag tu gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
272a8('dul ba): smon lam gyi dbang gi so// gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ bA ra na se'i grong khyer du khyim bdag cig gi bu shi nas/ de'i chung ma de rtag tu mngon par 'dod par gyur te// 
272b1('dul ba): gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
272b2('dul ba): dbyingasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ bA ra na ser rgyal po kri ki zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mched rten rin po che sna bzhi las brtsigs
272b3('dul ba): so// de nas bu med pa bu mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgas par gyur nas mchod rten de la byi der byas nas 'dug/ des 'dun pa'i slong mo byas nas mchod rten la mchon kyas/ smon lam
272b4('dul ba): btab pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs da rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces byas te/ 
272b5('dul ba): song nas grong khyer du zhug so// de na bud med cig nad kyi snga ga bsngal gyi tshir bas nyen nas ngu ba dang / des gzhan zhig la dris pa ci'i phyir 'di ngu bar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa/ 
272b6('dul ba): rnams smras pa dang / des bsams pa gal te bdag kyang bu 'byung bar gyur na/ bdag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyamasu myong bar 'gyuraro// snyam pa las/ ji tsam na sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga'
272b7('dul ba): 'dun gyi mchod rten nga la mchod pa bad pa na bud meng de yang de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'duge/ de rnams kyis mched pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag
272b8('dul ba): chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas// de rnams la dris pa/ bu dag khyed kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum 'di dang / 'di dag go// des
273a1('dul ba): smras pa bu dag gal te de lta na khyed cag gi mar bdag kho na gyur cig/ yum de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas de rnams deng ngo // des bsams pa/ 
273a2('dul ba): re shig bung med de lan cig bca' na yang sdug bsngal gyi tshe rabs nyen nas de ltar du na/ bdag la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis btsa' na/ ji ltar bya zhes de de ltar rnam par rtag pa na/ ma
273a3('dul ba): rten dang nye ba na bya gag mo zhig yod pa sgo nga 'byung bar de de thang cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la smre sngags kyang mi 'don te/ des bsams pa/ 'byung ba'i thabs 'di rung ba
273a4('dul ba): yin no snyam du rig nas mched rten de la dad pa drag pos smon lam bdag par brtsams pa/ ji ltar bya gag mo/ 'di thang cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ba de bzhin du
273a5('dul ba): bdag gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang ci sgo ngar 'byung bar gyur/ cig ces byaso// dge slong dag/  ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de 'i dus na bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de nyid sa ga ma 'di nyid yin/ 
273a6('dul ba): no// sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/ 'dis de na smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis
273a7('dul ba): byung ngo // btsun pa sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa bgyis shing / skyen ma mchis par rgyal po gsal gyis bskum nas/ de rnams
273a8('dul ba): kyi mgos gzeb bkang ste/ sa ga ma la bskur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag khe nas las rnams byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ 
273b1('dul ba): lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i ri bor zhig na chang 'tshong zhig gnaso// tshem brkun pa rab tu mang po chang tshel
273b2('dul ba): zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas dris pa chang yod dam/ chang 'tsheng gi chung mas smras pa/ yedo zhes de rnams kyis chang blung na/ 'dzar ba med nas/ des glang zhig bstan te/ 'di song cig/ de rnams
273b3('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ mtshon cha med do// des gta' blangs nas tshen cha byin pa dang / de rnams kyis de bsang bar brtsams pa dang / de gsod pa na sems la bdag gsong ba gang yin pa 'di dag
273b4('dul ba): cad ni chang tsheng gi chung ma 'di yin gyis/ bdag gang du' di di rnams kyi mgo bcad nas/ gzeb bkang ste/ 'di la dbaskur bar 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces bsam so// dge
273b5('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gang la na ba de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin no// chom rkun pa gang yin pa de rnams ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di de rnams
273b6('dul ba): yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no zhes rgyas par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la nad
273b7('dul ba): dka gnas pa na bzhug so// de'i tshe drang song mngon par shre ba lnga dang ldan pa'i bsti gnas na gshig yod do// de de na 'chags pa las bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa rdza ba
273b8('dul ba): can gyi phyogs shig tu gcin khu chu dang bcas pa zhig gcis so// glo bur du ri dgas mo skom pas nyen pas zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ de skom pas nyen pas de 'thungs nas mo'i dbang
274a1('dul ba): po la bsnam so// sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ sems can dang ldan par gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na phyogs de
274a2('dul ba): nyid du 'ongs nas khe'u zhig byung ba dang / des de snams na skal ba mi mthun pa'i sems can yin nas bor te song ngo // ji tsam na drang srong de bsti gnas de na 'chag pa las/ khe'u de mthong nas/ 
274a3('dul ba): 'di suM'i bu yin zhes de bsam pa la zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na bdag gi yin par mthong na/ des de ba sti gnasu bzhag ste/ bsnun bstod bskyed nas de'i mgo ri dgas kyi 'dra bas ri dgas
274a4('dul ba): mgo zhes bya bar grag so// dus gzhan zhig na drang srong shi nas/ ri dgas mgos klad pa'i thod pa rdob pa'i rig pe bslabs te/ de thod pa brdabs nas thams cad lung ston/ 
274a5('dul ba): bar byed de/ gal te re shig sgra drag por gyur na/ gyen du/ 'gro ba lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ra lung ston pa ra byed do// 'on te 'bring du gyur na gyen du 'gro ba mir skye bar lung sten
274a6('dul ba): par byed de/ de ni bde 'gro'i rtog so// ngan 'gro'i rtags ni gal te ri shig sgra mi gsal bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro po sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed de// 'on te
274a7('dul ba): sgra 'bring du gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba/ dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do// 'on ta sga chung bar gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba yi dag su skye bar lung ston par byed do// de nas bcom
274a8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi
274b1('dul ba): cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/ mgo bzhi khyer te drang srong de'i drung du song nas khyed kyis lung ston cig des rgyun
274b2('dul ba): du zhugs pa'i thod pa la brdabs nas smras pa 'di ni lha rnamasu skyeso// lan cig par 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no// dgra bcom pa'i thod pa la yang brdabs na// 
274b3('dul ba): ma shes rnam par ma shes nas ngo tsha bas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ bdag cag bstan pa de las nyams gyur tam/ 'on te slob dpon rigs las
274b4('dul ba): ma skyes sam/ 'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ma yin nam/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ khyod kyi rig pa kun legs gems ma
274b5('dul ba): byas/ ri shig rig pa mtha' dag rtogs byas la// khyod kyis/ phyi nas 'jig rten lung ston cig/ ri dag so mgos smra sa pa/ khyod kyis rig pa thams cad la byang ba 'ga' mthong
274b6('dul ba): ba yod dam/ des smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// de nas ri dgas mgo/ bcom ldan
274b7('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba lha mi skye bo'i 'gro 'tshal na// rig pa'i skyon gyis sems
274b8('dul ba): can spong ba drug pa ma 'tshal gyis// gtso bo srid pa gsum gyi mtsho chen pha rol byon pa po// pha rol smra kun las rgyal drag pa ma 'tshal de ci gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
275a1('dul ba): srul pa/ mer bsregs pa lcags kyi me/ lcags kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas// rims kyis nye bar zhi ba yi// 'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa// de
275a2('dul ba): bzhin 'dod pa'i 'dam tshogs las rgal te/ yang dag rnam grol ba// mi g.yo go 'phang 'thob rnams kyi// 'gro ba bdag su yod ma yin// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
275a3('dul ba): ldan 'das la ri dgas mgos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dus rab tu 'byung ba dang / brnyan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
275a4('dul ba): thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshad das par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung snyan par rdzogs par mdzad de// de rab
275a5('dul ba): tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ rgyal po'i kha bo tu ji tsom bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ma nyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyi su zhing
275a6('dul ba): gshegs pa dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bla gab med pa na 'chag cing rgyu
275a7('dul ba): skar rnams gyur pa gzig so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas mgo la bka' stsal pa/ ri dgas mgo ji srid cig na lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur soms shig/ nges bsam pa btsun
275a8('dul ba): pa 'jig rten 'di ma rung 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/ rgyu skar rnams ji ltar gnas pa dang sbar na le bcu gnyi su char mi 'bab lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams mthun par byin
275b1('dul ba): gyis brlabs nas/ bka' stsal pa yang shes par gyis shig/ des gsol ba le drug tu lags so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smras pa dang / gsol pa/ lngar lag so// de
275b2('dul ba): bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du'o// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam/ la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par spros shig/ de ring kho nar lhas bye ba'i tsheg
275b3('dul ba): lta bu'i char 'beb par 'gyur te/ de la khrus byed pa gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras dang / phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// ri dgas mgo de ltar na rgyu skar rnams ni 'gyur ba g.yo ba/ 
275b4('dul ba): mi brtan pa yin te/ srog kyang g.yo ba mi brtan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rid gus mgo mngon par dang bar gyur to// 
275b5('dul ba): de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas dgra pa com pa mngon sum du byas// de nas rnam par grol ba/ 'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas/ tshigs su bcang bas smras pa/ 
275b6('dul ba): ri dgas rnams ni nags khrod rten// mngadab chags rnams ni mkha' la rten// rnam par sgom pa chos la rten// dgra bcom mya ngan 'das la rten// ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gams bcom ldan
275b7('dul ba): 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ mnyan yod na byon nas/ mnyan yeng na bdag kho na'i kun dka' ra ba kho na na bzhugs zhes theso// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
275b8('dul ba): song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi
276a1('dul ba): ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bas gan
276a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
276a3('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshed sbyor zhing mchiso na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom
276a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sa ga ma la cang mi gsung bas gan ngo zhes bya ba nas nor bu'i chu sned bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'a/ dras la bu mo mngag gzhug ma dus tshed gsel ba du ga
276a5('dul ba): shings na bu mo mngag gzhug ma de sngon gyi kun dga' ra/ bar song nas/ sgo gseb nas bltas na dge slong / rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa mthong // mthong nas kyang
276a6('dul ba): bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/ 'tshe ba pa nal phrug 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab po snyam nas/ de rings pa rings par 'ongs te smras pa/ jo
276a7('dul ba): mo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tshe ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab lagaso// sa ga mas bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
276a8('dul ba): gnang nas/ gdugs tshed ma gsol bar bzhud pa 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas med cing skabs med do// gdon mi za bar 'dis dge slong sgren mo rnams mthong ngo snyam nas/ des
276b1('dul ba): dus tshod gsol ba skyes pa gzhan zhig btang ste/ des btsun pa gdugs tshed lags shing / mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes
276b2('dul ba): bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsel zin nas phag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan
276b3('dul ba): 'ongs la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar 'tshal te glo bur pa la stsal pa dang / mchi bar chas pa la sprul pa dang / bo 'tshal ba la stsal pa
276b4('dul ba): dang / bro g.yog la sprul pa dang / srung nas kyi 'dzams norasman nar ma dang / dge slong rnams la dbyar gyis gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras so// 
276b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa ga ma khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig mthong na/ glo bur 'ongs pa la sbyi na pa sbyin/ btsun pa glo bur du mchis pa'i dge slong ni sbeng
276b6('dul ba): yul mi mkhas pa dang / lam srang mi mkhas pa legs pas des bdag cag gi bsod snyoms la long spang na/ spyod yul la mkhas pa dang / lam srang la mkhas par 'gyur lags so// 
276b7('dul ba): sa ga ma de thugasu chud de leg so leg so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun po dge slong mchi bar chas bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ 'dren pa rnams
276b8('dul ba): dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshegs dang bral na phongs par 'gyur bas/ des bdag gis bsod snyoms la long spyod na tshegs dang bral bar mi 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thugs su
277a1('dul ba): chung de/ legs so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ nang pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong bro 'tshal ba bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ 
277a2('dul ba): nyon mongs pa'am/ 'gum par yang 'gyur bas/ des bdag gis bsod snyoms la long spang na/ bro nad las ldang ba dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so// sa
277a3('dul ba): ga ma de yang thugasu chud de legaso legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na nad g.yog lo sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong bro g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshel du
277a4('dul ba): mchis na/ bre 'tshal na bro 'tshal ri gyi ba nyams par dgyur pas des bdag gis bsod snyoms la long sa spyod na 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang
277a5('dul ba): thugs su chud de leg so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/ bcu na po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la drong chung ba
277a6('dul ba): yang mchis/ drong che ba yang mchis te/ de la re shig dreng chung ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nas thug 'tshal na drod skye bar 'gyur la/ drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nyams sgeg
277a7('dul ba): 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so leg so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
277a8('dul ba): rnams la bre nang mang ba dang / bro nang nyung ba mchis te/ de la bro nang mang po gang lags pa de rnams la ni re shig 'tshal ches bro nang nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na
277b1('dul ba): lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de leg so leg so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos
277b2('dul ba): ras chen sbyin/ btsun pa di ring kho na bdag gis bu mo mngag gzhug bgyid pa dus tshed gsol bar btang ba las/ des dge slong rnams sgren mor khras bgyid pa mthong nas de slar
277b3('dul ba): mchis te/ bdag la 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/ 'tshe ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du btab po zhes mchi bas de rnams dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyis bkab
277b4('dul ba): par 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de la gus se log so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge seng ma rnams la khrus ras sbyin/ btsun pa dus 'di cig na
277b5('dul ba): khyim pa mo rab tu mang po dag/ dge slong ma rab tu mang po rna mas chu bo gnas ldan la sgren mor khrus bgyid pa las/ khyim pa med rnams kyis rgad cing rkang nas mdzub
277b6('dul ba): ker gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi mdo ma nye bar ston te/ de dag gis nye bar bstan pa rnams/ bag 'khums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khras ras kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par
277b7('dul ba): 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma legs se legs so// khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyad smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun
277b8('dul ba): rnams la yang dag par snang zhing 'di dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun pa gang dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi/ 
278a1('dul ba): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes tshang bzung bar mi nus kyi 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nam kyi na pa zhi bya ba'i gangasu 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du
278a2('dul ba): 'dus so// btsun pa bdag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de snga nas dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung
278a3('dul ba): bi'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor
278a4('dul ba): nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byeng bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bsta/ ngan pa thos te/ de mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing / slar yang mche bar 'gyur la/ des bdag gi blo bur du
278a5('dul ba): mchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras longs spong bar gyur lagaso zhe/ sa bya ba'i bar te thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba
278a6('dul ba): rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang
278a7('dul ba): zhe sdang dang / gti mug srabs pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan yong du ras
278a8('dul ba): 'ga' mchi zhing slar mchil/ des bdag gi blo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyo gis ras cheni dang / dge slong ma khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar geng ma bzhin te/ thos nas kyang dga'ang
278b1('dul ba): dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo dge slong 'di ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i
278b2('dul ba): kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan du mchi zhing / slar mchil ngas
278b3('dul ba): bdag go glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras tshan dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes pa bi'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dag
278b4('dul ba): ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom
278b5('dul ba): pa mngon sum du byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu 'jug par 'gyur zhes lung ba stan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing / slar
278b6('dul ba): yang mchil des bdag gis glo bur pa'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab
278b7('dul ba): tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob por 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i btam gyis yang
278b8('dul ba): dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng stong / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
279a1('dul ba): yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas yangs pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhi gshegs pa na/ yangs ba can byonas rba ba can gyi spre'u rdzing
279a2('dul ba): gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnapas chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas/ yangs pa can du bsod snyem
279a3('dul ba): la zhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang 'dings par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis
279a4('dul ba): dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra bo'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang
279a5('dul ba): yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dang da pa can dag lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag zang zad/ du sbyin par btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de
279a6('dul ba): la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms sprad do zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ zas phyi mo'i bsod snyoms spangs
279a7('dul ba): shing / lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos mkhos su phab nos zhabs bsil te/ nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug log khang du zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du
279a8('dul ba): yang dag 'dzeg las bzhengs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsa
279b1('dul ba): pa/ dge slong dag 'dir snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ban
279b2('dul ba): sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can
279b3('dul ba): dag lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag zang zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spong bar byed do// dge slong dag dang
279b4('dul ba): pas byin pa la bag yod par spong ba dang / dus su spyod dpa dang / skabs skabs su spyod pa dang / brtags te/ daspyod pa dang / cung zad spong po ni legs se leg so// de nas
279b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin pa la bag yod/ bas spang bar bya ba'i bsngags pa gsungs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ 
279b6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding ba med par longs sprad par mi bya'o// gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos na de'i med kho na la bkru bar bya ste/ gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// 
279b7('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs mnoms lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / yangs po can du
279b8('dul ba): bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgya ba nag por gyur pa zhig ring po kho na nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 
280a1('dul ba): kun dga' bo khyod kyi mi rgyab nag po pa bi mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo mi pa bi ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
280a2('dul ba): srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la/ ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding ba dang / shur ba dang / rgya cang dang / lcug gu'i
280a3('dul ba): gding bas gting nas longs spyod pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to// da dung yang 'di rgyab nag por gyur to// zhes rig par mdzad nas/ 
280a4('dul ba): yangs pa can du bsod snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba nas nang du yang dag par 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ra ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
280a5('dul ba): gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so// bzhugs/ nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la ba// 'astsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring nga snga dro sham thabs
280a6('dul ba): bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/ de ni yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ad
280a7('dul ba): srung gi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur pa las/ de nas des dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga rgyu'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya
280a8('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dang phan chad ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la longs
280b1('dul ba): spyad par mi bya'o// longs spyang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// 'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ sdug na ni rim gcig gis so// seng ba zhig ni rim gnyis
280b2('dul ba): kyis so// dge slong rnams gdong ba kra zhing bkra ba kha tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smong bar byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ 
280b3('dul ba): kha zer bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po 'am/ 'dam ko 'am/ kha sgyur ba'i glo ding ba gris gras pa bar bya ste/ gzhin du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ 
280b4('dul ba): dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas/ de'i ches gosad rnams rnag dang khrag gis reg nas dri mi zhim pa sgra dang ma rnams 'du zhing de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bri
280b5('dul ba): ngang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhe ga 'bras byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / 
280b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ g.yan pa dgab btsong bar bya ste/ zhag lnga 'am/ drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o// gzhan du na 'gal
280b7('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong mdza' nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / khams dang / rdzing dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'tshogs rnams dang / shing drung
280b8('dul ba): gi gnas rnams ni dri mi zhim pa dang / sbrang ma rnams khor bas gnas shing longs spang bar byed po de dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzheg
281a1('dul ba): 'phyas byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
281a2('dul ba): dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu spyod pa'i tshes dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas/ dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / gnas khang la
281a3('dul ba): longs spang bar mi bya/ khyams rnams dang ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khams la sogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi chab khungs sa dang / snam phyi ser 'jug par mi bya zhing dge 'dun gyis
281a4('dul ba): de la gnos dben pa byin nas/ rim gre bya'o// dge slong // mdze nad kyis thebs pas/ kun tu sbyong ba'i chos ji lta dar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jugs par mi
281a5('dul ba): byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// / 'dul ba bzhi/ bam po re bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
281a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' tshes gos lhag par bcad du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo btsun pa men dar gyi chos
281a7('dul ba): gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te/ bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ci dgar zad de/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang sha
281a8('dul ba): na'i ras la yang rung ngo // sdom la gso ma skra'i tshes gos dang / gcer bu skra 'bral lo ma'i ges// mthang gos bcas dang g.yang gzhi dang // gse ras seng ras pa car sde// gleng gzhi ni/ 
281b1('dul ba): mnyan yod na'o// dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ 
281b2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsel to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
281b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gse ma'i ches gos 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis gso ma'i ges bcang bar mi bya'o// bcangs na
281b4('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig 'od sra nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skra'i chos gos 'chang bar/ 
281b5('dul ba): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye/ nyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro zhes bya
281b6('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsor bu bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bo/ 
281b7('dul ba): sprul pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod gcer bu byed/ de
281b8('dul ba): lta bas na dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o// byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de gcer bu mi bya'o// byas na nyes pa sbom par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de
282a1('dul ba): gnang ba dang / bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur to// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
282a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di gcer bu ma gnang ba dang / bslabs pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
282a3('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyin cig dge slong dag sden byung ba ngang pa'i rgyal
282a4('dul ba): bo yul 'khor skyeng zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rang khim tha ba tshol zhes yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur to// se so nas
282a5('dul ba): bsams pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyu ro snyam mo// des/ bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di ni bdag gi khri/ ma thab tu 'gyur ro// de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyed
282a6('dul ba): khyim thab tu 'dam so so zhes smras pa dang / se so nas des mjug ma bsgreng nas gar byed par brtsams pa dang / yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ni ci zhig gi phyir gor
282a7('dul ba): bying gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag khyed kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas// des smras pa/ ngo tsha dang khrel dang mi ldan pas/ 'di la bdag gis bu me mi ldan pas/ 'di la bdag
282a8('dul ba): gos bu me mi sbyin no// zhes pa rma bya des thos nas/ yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song nas/ tshigs su bcang de smras pa/ dbyangs bsnyen yid 'ong kha deg mdzes pa dang // mdab ma 'dom gang
282b1('dul ba): tshang ldan mgrin pa ni// nor bu bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra gyur na/ ci slang khyod kyi sras mo bdag mi sprul// yul 'khyer skyong gis smras pa/ dbyangs bstan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang / 
282b2('dul ba): mngab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin po ni// nor buM bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra gyur kyang // 'dzem med bskyen gyis khyod la mi sbyin no// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya gang yin/ 
282b3('dul ba): pa de ni/ dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas/ bya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo // da ltar yang 'dis gcer/ 
282b4('dul ba): bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/ dge slong gi tshigs kyis nang nas byung ngo // yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcu/ 
282b5('dul ba): pa bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'dag par rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod skra 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ 
282b6('dul ba): skra 'bal ba ni 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis skra 'bal bar mi bya'o// 'bal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom
282b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul
282b8('dul ba): zhugs yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel to// btsun pa
283a1('dul ba): dag bla gos mthang gos dang bal tsho bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang
283a2('dul ba): na/ ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tshe bar byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gi bla ges mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tshe bar mi bya'o// 'tshe bar
283a3('dul ba): byed na 'gol tshobs can du 'gyur ro// / yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag g.yang

283a6('dul ba): gos 'chang bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba'i bar nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
283a7('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag pa cha ro'ichang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
283a8('dul ba): skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste pa char 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom

283b3('dul ba): tsang ser ba'am/ thams cad dmar ba 'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba yin pa nyid do// sdom la kha tshar ring dang gdongs ka dang / rol ka gtsug tor theng dang ni// ra ba la gas dang

284a1('dul ba): ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan
284a2('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun po bdag gtsug gtor bgyi do par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes byab

284b1('dul ba): zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ de phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de'i rnam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
284b2('dul ba): slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'bar med par dam mi bca' zhing / snom sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o// song na 'gal che bas can du 'gyur ro// tshe dang

284b7('dul ba): rnyed dang de de yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na dge slong rnams kyis dgag dpe byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur
284b8('dul ba): dong ba dang / de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa lan du gzhug pa'i phyir/ dge slong lo bcol nas 'gre bar bya'o// ma
285a1('dul ba): bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i

285b1('dul ba): slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa/

285b8('dul ba): ma 'byong ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis de bsu ra 'gro'o snyam nas/ gnas brtan byin pa lags so// byon pa legaso// sleb

286b7('dul ba): na lta/ nye dga' gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phag dar bya'o// 'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de

287a1('dul ba): bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnang la phab pas skyed nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas

287a3('dul ba): rnyong pa thob na lta/ nye dgas 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dus thams cad du chos bshang ngo // rnying pa gang cung zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs gcig
287a4('dul ba): shes de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang phyag dar dang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byu/ dag pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phag ngar bang ba
287a5('dul ba): la yon tan lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi/ sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems/ dang por 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' b.ro 'gyur
287a6('dul ba): ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mthe ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de
287a7('dul ba): lta bas na gtsug lag khang phyug dar byas pas yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa 'byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i
287a8('dul ba): mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas nges ci byin po de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de gnyis spobs pa meng bar
287b1('dul ba): byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las mi 'khru du 'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o// de gnyis kyis sngar smra phab pas
287b2('dul ba): smras pa/ gnas brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug go/ de gnyis kyi bar du ni tsha cig bzhag
287b3('dul ba): nas gsel ba bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig/ 'di gnyis dang kho bo cag ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo// de ni gsol ba'o// de na cha gnyis ni bdag
287b4('dul ba): nyid kyis blangs so// cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang // de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la
287b5('dul ba): gos shig/ des bgo bar brtsams pa/ de nis ras yu/ ga gcig kha 'khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras/ rnams bam por bcings te song ngo // de nas rim gyis
287b6('dul ba): mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nyi dga' khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de
287b7('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ khyed de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
287b8('dul ba): la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gzhan/ 
288a1('dul ba): gyi rnyedang pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams
288a2('dul ba): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nyi dgas rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
288a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sden byung ba
288a4('dul ba): 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na/ sram gnyis shig gnas ba las de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la then par 'gyur zhing gang gi tshe skam la deng ba de'i tshe tshul
288a5('dul ba): nang du deng nas chu zad kyang mi rnyed do// de nas de gnyis kyi/ sa gros byas pabadag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa
288a6('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni sprir ba'o// de ni cig ni chur seng ngo // gcag shes ni skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bsgegs te skam la gtan nas/ de rnams
288a7('dul ba): skam la gnas pos bsad ngo // chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so// ji tsam na nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang / gcig gis smras pa khyed kyis gos shig gcig
288a8('dul ba): shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi 'ged de ci'i phyir/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems khos
288b1('dul ba): su chud cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba/ de gnyis kyi drung du ngas nas des smras pa/ tsha bdag ci ste khongs su chud cing 'dug/ gang po dag dag ga/ 
288b2('dul ba): rnyed pas so// ci ste mi 'geng / zhang po nyes pas 'jigs so// khyed ni nyes pas 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa'i spri'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur
288b3('dul ba): bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis gdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtog tu g.yog byed pa ru spru 'o zhig mthong nas/ gcig
288b4('dul ba): gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdago chur zhugs te bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bsgrags te/ skams la thon pa
288b5('dul ba): dang / 'dis bsang ngo // tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad theb na lta/ bzhi rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'a/ 'o// skam la 'gro ba ni sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang / 
288b6('dul ba): tsher ma'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zin gyi 'jigs pa dang / mi'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te nges ma bsad na/ khyed
288b7('dul ba): kyis bsgrogs kyang ci pha na/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de
288b8('dul ba): gnang pa la phabs skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas gcig shos drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag bya/ zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste/ 
289a1('dul ba): bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsang ngo // tsha bo gal te skam la song nas chung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la
289a2('dul ba): 'gre'o// chur 'gro ba'i de dba' gong gis 'jigs pa dang / ru sbal gyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin kum bi ra'i 'jigs
289a3('dul ba): pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsgegs na khyod kyis ji ltar bsad/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas de ci/ 
289a4('dul ba): byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnang la phab pos skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug gre/ bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshig
289a5('dul ba): su bcad pa'i dbyings kyis/ mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i tha/ bas yod // de sngar smra phab pas smras pa/ zhe khe ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas
289a6('dul ba): kyis cha gsum pa bgos te/ nya'i 'jug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu bas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 
289a7('dul ba): thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/ gting du rgyu bas mgo ba'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ de ni chos la gnas pas bkur// bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di
289a8('dul ba): gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan ni snyam nas des nye chen po zhig gi rked pa khyer te/ ma'i drung du seng ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcang ba'i dbyangs kyi
289b1('dul ba): dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyed ni gang nas 'ongs// mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i// nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni// shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs// des smras pa/ gang
289b2('dul ba): phyir blun po rtsed gyur cing // chos dang chos min mi shes pas// rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar// des ni cheg shes 'tsho bar 'gyur// des kyang tshigasu bcad ba smras
289b3('dul ba): bo/ rgyas pas blta na sdug pa khyed// pha rol mnan pa shin tu legs// de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyed kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sem+ba/ 
289b4('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhini rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dag/ 'a 'di nyid yin no// sram gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de
289b5('dul ba): gnyis 'dis bslas la/ da ltar yang de gnyis bslas so// // glang gzhi ni gnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khim
289b6('dul ba): bdag zhig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa ras yug brgya bsgrubs te dag
289b7('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// ji tsam na nye dgas khyim bdag che ge me zhag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun
289b8('dul ba): gdugs tshed gsil te/ re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de las ras yug gcig ma grub na/ bdag nyid ga
290a1('dul ba): ma yin no snyam nas de mgron du ma pos bzhin du song ngo // khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ ras
290a2('dul ba): rnams 'grim pa dang / nye dgas ras gcig blangs nas myur myur ba raM seng ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chang ngo // khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa
290a3('dul ba): ngag bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal mchisi na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ 
290a4('dul ba): khyim bdag de ltar su zhig byed 'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag ba de dag gis spun ma drangaso// ngas ras de khyer nas song ngo // 
290a5('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de / slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsal ba/ dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes
290a6('dul ba): dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong dag mgron du ma nges par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur kyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa/ 
290a7('dul ba): la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/ 
290a8('dul ba): la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
290b1('dul ba): dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye dgas mgron du ma bos pas gzhan gyi rnyedang pa la thob rgyal byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ 
290b2('dul ba): ri bo ra zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u brgya/ zla ba gsum du mgrin du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u
290b3('dul ba): re la yang ras yug re re bsnyen no snyam mo// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bram ze rgan pa zhig gnas pa des thos nas/ de rgan po'i mthar 'dug ste/ theg mar
290b4('dul ba): zes nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo // bram zes ras rnams 'drim par byed pa na/ ji tsam dan bram ze'i khye'u gcig gis ras chad nas des dris pa
290b5('dul ba): shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug ginyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams
290b6('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid / 'on kyang khyed kyis bram ze rgan po mgrin du bos sam/ bdag gis mgron du ma bos so// des ras yug de theg mar blangs
290b7('dul ba): nas song ngo // bram ze des smad par brtsams so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te
290b8('dul ba): na yang de mgron du ma bos so// da lta na yang ngo // / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// 
291a1('dul ba): ri ror zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des/ gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas
291a2('dul ba): ba las/ de ldeng ba phun sum tshogs bzhag pas / des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag ngar byed do// gtsug lag khang don sa byegs dben zhing bzang
291a3('dul ba): ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dang ba dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad
291a4('dul ba): 'byin pa me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi mdzes par byos pa yin no// ji tsam na de dpon 'byer ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dges
291a5('dul ba): btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khung de mdzes pa da/ nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas rma/ ngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
291a6('dul ba): ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas/ de nang par sngar langs te song ngo // dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no/ 
291a7('dul ba): zhes 'gyod pa las ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
291a8('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis pa'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang der gal te bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis dge/ 
291b1('dul ba): 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu byam ngal mo cher phul na na gnas pa gcig gam gnyis sam rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/ del 'gyod par mi bya
291b2('dul ba): snam la bye ba rnams la sil ni// snron nga srod rgyu las// dge 'dun dang ni chos shes kyi// rnying pa brgyad du byung// 
291b3('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang log su dge 'dun bye bar gyur
291b4('dul ba): na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am mi stsal bar bgyi/ btso dam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye b.ra'o khor kha cig lo ni sbyin no kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// 
291b5('dul ba): gang la stsal bar bgyi chos dang 'thun pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logasu dge slong gis bslu ba pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed bskul bar bgyi 'am/ 
291b6('dul ba): mi srul bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khar kha tsog la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang / 
291b7('dul ba): logs su dge slong gum par gyur na/ rnyed pasul bar bgyi 'am/ rnyed bskul bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mo sbyin no// gang
291b8('dul ba): la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// ri 'or zhing zhig no khyim bdag cig yod pa des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhog brtsigs// 
292a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing bsong ba las gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag der zas byin nas/ ras yug
292a2('dul ba): lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya bai de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo // ji tsam ni de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len pa dang / drang srong
292a3('dul ba): byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri 'or de nyid du phyin nas/ khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas ras yug lnga rgya byin no// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ 
292a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa dge khyed kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag kho nas theb
292a5('dul ba): par 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan be ni bsad nams che ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ te/ des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do// 
292a6('dul ba): de rnams kyis slar lan klan par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
292a7('dul ba): dag rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / dge
292a8('dul ba): 'dun gyir btags pa dang / dge slong gir btags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / so sor brtan pa'o// mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na
292b1('dul ba): 'di lta ste gnas nyid la/ gso sbyong gcig la ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge
292b2('dul ba): slong rnams kyi yin no// de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/ de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de na
292b3('dul ba): gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin te/ gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa
292b4('dul ba): zhes bya'o// khrims kyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su brtada' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge me zhig go/ kho bo cag gi ni
292b5('dul ba): khyim che ge me zhig go/ lam po che dang tsheng 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni spyi'i yin no zhes bya kha nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ gal
292b6('dul ba): te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams
292b7('dul ba): la rnyed pa bul lo// dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam
292b8('dul ba): bcas pa dang / dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byon nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na/ rnyed pa gang dbang ba
293a1('dul ba): bam po lnga pa/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa
293a2('dul ba): dul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu dngas na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / 
293a3('dul ba): dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas nan pa'i thar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chung ngas na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam
293a4('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bca so/ ba'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa
293a5('dul ba): rnams la rnyed pa phul la rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyeng ba gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dum bcus pa deng / dam ma bcas pa'i
293a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams rnyeng pa phul la dmam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams khe
293a7('dul ba): na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / ngam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zin byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la/ ngam/ bcas pa rnams
293b1('dul ba): chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong
293b2('dul ba): rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam
293b3('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zani byon nas/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam
293b4('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyis gnas su dam bcas pa da / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas shes bya ba
293b5('dul ba): rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnam sa zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o// gal
293b6('dul ba): ta bram ze dang / khyim bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang / tsheng 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge
293b7('dul ba): slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// 
293b8('dul ba): lam po che dang / tsheng 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams
294a1('dul ba): la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tsheng 'dus
294a2('dul ba): dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mngo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas
294a3('dul ba): ba rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tsheng 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas ba dang
294a4('dul ba): ngam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma btsas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bca/ ngas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar
294a5('dul ba): 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong / 'dus dang / bzhi med dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong / 
294a6('dul ba): rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshes
294a7('dul ba): 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan
294a8('dul ba): pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na// gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tsheng 'das dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bca
294b1('dul ba): ba'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar log su rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// 
294b2('dul ba): lam po che dang / tsheng 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed
294b3('dul ba): ba bul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa
294b4('dul ba): dang / dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rga ngan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha de' nyid du chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ 
294b5('dul ba): gnyi ga'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa da gu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i
294b6('dul ba): rnyed pa zhes bya'o// rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning gang la brten te/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang
294b7('dul ba): yin pa de ni/ de kho na'i yin te/ 'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes pa'o// dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyeng pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 
294b8('dul ba): 'di ni dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyed pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge slong gir btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i'o// 
295a1('dul ba): yang thog pa'i 'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes btags pa ni/ de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong
295a2('dul ba): gi ra btags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni
295a3('dul ba): dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// mngon sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la dmigs dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// so sor
295a4('dul ba): bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bstan pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba ste/ gal te
295a5('dul ba): mchod rten chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na/ mchod rta/ na cig kho na la dbul gyi gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste// 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// sdo ma la/ 
295a6('dul ba): gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang // bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang // gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang / dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas btso
295a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar ga nas cig na/ gnas nas byung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa
295a8('dul ba): la de rnams las gnas nas byung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor ring bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis
295b1('dul ba): mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum na/ de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams
295b2('dul ba): kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ 8
295b3('dul ba): bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na/ gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa lang de rnams la nga
295b4('dul ba): rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na/ rnyeng pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnamaso// gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po ni// 
295b5('dul ba): mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum pa lag sa na/ gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ 
295b6('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig shes so// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa la gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas/ 
295b7('dul ba): phyung ba rnams las theg mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams
295b8('dul ba): kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i tshes gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes
296a1('dul ba): par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs pa bgos pa yin no// bsres nas bgod par byed na/ ma bgos
296a2('dul ba): panyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul
296a3('dul ba): 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma byung bar shi na ngam bcas pa rnams kyis ngam ma bcas pa rnams
296a4('dul ba): la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung ba zed long shig ces pho nya btang ba ri ba'o// dam pa bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos
296a5('dul ba): pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams la 'ged par be nga na/ bgos pa legs par dgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
296a6('dul ba): yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la spro bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi
296a7('dul ba): na ngam bcas pa rnams kyis/ ngam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spong ba shi yis de'i lhung bzad chos gos leng shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// khas
296a8('dul ba): blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'geng par byed na/ bges pa legs par bges pa yin no// bsres te
296b1('dul ba): 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas
296b2('dul ba): su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na/ dam bcas
296b3('dul ba): ba rnams kyis ngam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa sho yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa
296b4('dul ba): rnams 'ged par byed na ma begs pa nye bar bgos pa yin ni// dam mo bcas pa rnams 'gong par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas
296b5('dul ba): 'ged par byed na/ ma bges pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma
296b6('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khed kyi dge tshul shi yos de'i lhung bzed dang
296b7('dul ba): chos gos longs shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dem ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'geng bar byed
296b8('dul ba): na/ bgos pa legs par bges pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos po nyes par bges pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs
297a1('dul ba): par bsngos yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag dang
297a2('dul ba): du gsel/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang mu phyung bar shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung
297a3('dul ba): bzang dang tshes gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nye bar bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams
297a4('dul ba): 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'geng bar byed no/ ma bgos dpa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong
297a5('dul ba): gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi ni/ dam ma bcas
297a6('dul ba): pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang ches gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa
297a7('dul ba): rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed
297a8('dul ba): na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dom
297b1('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o// zhes smras pa las de yang ma byung bar shi na/ dam ma bcas pa
297b2('dul ba): rnams kyi dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spong ba shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos leng shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams
297b3('dul ba): 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed
297b4('dul ba): na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dog das bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ 9dgas par bsngos pa yin no// sde ma ni nye dga' dang ni
297b5('dul ba): byin gyis brlabs// bar ma sbyin dang brlang bya dang // bdag shi sbyin pa mang ba dang // spang ba dang ni mig sum mo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// nya dga'i spyi
297b6('dul ba): bor phol mig cig byung nas de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzangs kho bo la sten cig/ des smras pa 'phags pa mar khu gsel cig dang ses par 'gyur ro// nye dga' bsam
297b7('dul ba): pa/ gal te da ring kho na 'thungs nas/ di ring nyid du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re shig bslangs la pi nas brdung bar 'gyur bar
297b8('dul ba): bya'o snyam du shes nas/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa rnams kun du mngags pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang / rma g.yog pa'i gos phal mo che
298a1('dul ba): blangs so// phyi de nyin par sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod spyan gdangs sam khyed kyis mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thung so// 'bag
298a2('dul ba): ba ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis dang nyis 'gyur du gsol// cog / des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smos pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po zas
298a3('dul ba): ba lags so// kho bo'i nad 'di ni cher skyes pas gyur te/ mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos mang du gos kyis slengs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos pal mo tsha bslangs so// 
298a4('dul ba): de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas/ nyi ma de la/ yang ma 'thungs pas/ de'i nang rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa
298a5('dul ba): 'phags pa mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thung sa so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// des smras pa bzhin bzangs de ring ni sum gyur du btung po/ 
298a6('dul ba): sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgom gyi nang du nub par zhugs kyang da ni khyod la sreg ma mchis so// des smras pa gshin rje'i g.yeg 'dra ba khyed kyi mgul pa rdeg pas
298a7('dul ba): mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyu ro// sman pa des mdzal to zhes pas nas khros te seng ngo // de nas nye dgas mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las ma zhu nas shi'i
298a8('dul ba): de la gser mang du yod de/ cha gcig ni chos gos la so// cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman laso// cha gsum pa ni rdungasu byas pa dang / ma byas pa las te/ gser srang sum
298b1('dul ba): khri byung ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dag 'gum pa las/ de la gsur mang du drung ste/ gser srang sus khri mchis kyis de la bka' stsal / 
298b2('dul ba): rigs// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltan dang la ngo'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu seng ngo // de rnams kyang lhags nas/ gnas khang rgyas btang
298b3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis der dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
298b4('dul ba): gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan dpa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med
298b5('dul ba): bar gyur cig ces byas la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bye ba byed pa de'i tshe/ khyed/ kyis dge slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe/ 
298b6('dul ba): khyod bag ma gtong ba 'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang / bsod nams dang gnas mal dang na ba'i rgyan rtsi dang yo byad rnams kyis
298b7('dul ba): bstabs sam/ 'on te na pa na rim gro byas sam zhes gyis shig/ gal te ma bgyis so zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams
298b8('dul ba): kyi tha dad bas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'don tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas gtogs 'dod thing shig ces smos shig/ btsun
299a1('dul ba): pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gan
299a2('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa bzhin du bgyis te
299a3('dul ba): bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po'i lan bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka'
299a4('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'a dun gyi dbus su phyung ste/ bsgyur nas bgos so// 
299a5('dul ba): gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas/ da la gau ser mang du byung ste/ gsar srang sum/ khri dge slong rnams kyis dgos so// zhes thos nas
299a6('dul ba): de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye gi'i tshangs pa mtshungs pa spong ba yin pas bdag cig kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// 
299a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so// yangs pa can dang / bA ra na se pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang / 
299a8('dul ba): dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so// dge slong rnams sdud cing 'ged pa na/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang 'a// 
299b1('dul ba): pa dang / yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed bgo ba'i rgyu ni lta ste lnga ga
299b2('dul ba): zhe na/ gaN+DI dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsel ba'o// shi ba'i gaN+DI rdung ba na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud
299b3('dul ba): chags gsum 'don pa dang / mched rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'grim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ shi ba'i ye bang
299b4('dul ba): thams cad gsol ba byas te/ bgos na mi 'khrugs par bgyur ro// 'di ltar yang byas te/ gnas mal ba sha/ dmas la zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cod tshegs
299b5('dul ba): shing 'thun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin ni// shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ ge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol pa
299b6('dul ba): bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol gnas 'dir dge slong nya dga' gum ste// gum pade'i yo byad gadra' ba dang / mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'du/ 
299b7('dul ba): gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i ye byad rdzas gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum
299b8('dul ba): pa'i ye byad du byin gyis brlab pa'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste gsol ba'o// gsol ba byas nas dge slong
300a1('dul ba): 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no// tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gang
300a2('dul ba): na dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol bar bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am/ bgo bar mi bgyid lags/ nye bar 'khor thog ma dang tha mar byas nas
300a3('dul ba): bgo bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad cig sbyar te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyis rgan po dang / 
300a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gzhen pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo ba dar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gsel ba 'am tho ga ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs
300a5('dul ba): rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyu ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad nga gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
300a6('dul ba): pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'ongs pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig du ma zad de/ ji ltar
300a7('dul ba): 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'ongs par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnang du bsnan pa dang / de nas de
300a8('dul ba): gnad la bab pa'i tsher bas nyen cing mnga' phyi rjes bzhin du song nas/ rngon pa de srog dang bral lo// ji tsam na ma stes te/ chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri re ra zhig bcom nas phyogs
300b1('dul ba): der byin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo // mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sha 'di rnye dkris nyis bcwa lnga btsun
300b2('dul ba): ni glang po che'i sha bcad la bco'o// nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu glang ngo // de na glaso che'i sha bcad cing 'tsheng ba gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag
300b3('dul ba): bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ sha las ci yog pa zos la/ lhag ma dug gis gdab bo// de dag gri
300b4('dul ba): sha dug can zos dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro// zhes de rnams kyis tse yog pa'i sha zos nas/ lhag ma dug gis btab bo// gang dag tshul
300b5('dul ba): dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dbang nas chu ci yi/ ga ba 'thungs nas/ lhag ma dug blugs te/ 2/ ngas nas/ gang dag gis ni sha zes pa de rnams kyis kyang
300b6('dul ba): chu 'thungs/ gang dag gis chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur te// ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas/ byegs der 'ongs
300b7('dul ba): nas/ des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo // de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed pa phal me che yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas des gzhu
300b8('dul ba): mchog khar bcug ste/ gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca' bar brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa tshed dang mcheg mas dkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to// lhas tshig su bcad bas
301a1('dul ba): smras pa/ bsags par yang ni bya ba ste// lhag par bsags par mi bya'o// sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba// gzu yis bsang par gyur la
301a2('dul ba): ltos// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang lhag par chags pas shi'o// de ltar yang lhag par chags
