317a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtsa stug po dang / rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / lus rdul gyis yog
317a8('dul ba): pas ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyi ma langs dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ dge slong
317b1('dul ba): rnams la sra btang gnang bar bya'o// 'di ltar sra brkyang bting na phan yon lnga yod de zhag bcu las thal na ma yin pa dang / zla ba las thal na ma yin pa dang / nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang / 
317b2('dul ba): bla gos thang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang / chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang phan yon lnga yod da/ tshogs shing za na
317b3('dul ba): ma yin pa dang / yang yang za ba na ma yin pa dang / khyim rnamasu 'gron du ma bos par 'gron ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa chos gos btsal ba dang / ston zla 'bring po nas dpyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi nang der
317b4('dul ba): sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no snyam du dgongs na des dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta ba das na ngas rje su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams rig par gnas
317b5('dul ba): par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o// 'di ltar sra brkyang la phan
317b6('dul ba): lnga yod de/ zhag bcu thal nas ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas sra brkyang bting po rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal
317b7('dul ba): na/ dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding bar byar/ 
317b8('dul ba): gdang ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ re shig thog mar mthun pa'i glo ba byas ste/ chos gos 'din dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na chos
318a1('dul ba): gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bya'o// de nas phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/ dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgol/ 
318a2('dul ba): 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun
318a3('dul ba): gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sra brkyang bgyis nas/ sra brkyang gding bar bzhed na/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chas pa la chos gos rnying pa
318a4('dul ba): rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di
318a5('dul ba): ltar dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad de/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dingaso// des na sra/ brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa
318a6('dul ba): rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di
318a7('dul ba): ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags la dge 'dun yang sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang
318a8('dul ba): 'dongaso// des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar ba rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag
318b1('dul ba): chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi zhing chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa
318b2('dul ba): rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shing / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis chos sra brkyang du mdzad nas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun
318b3('dul ba): gyi sra brkyang 'dings te/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang / bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun
318b4('dul ba): gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong na
318b5('dul ba): sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya zhing bskos ba ni dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral pa dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcwa pa dang / 
318b6('dul ba): dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya ste/ spob pa dang / gzhi nas slob pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spod pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba
318b7('dul ba): spyod pa dang / gnas nas phyung ba'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gos 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro
318b8('dul ba): bo dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba mi shes pa'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya zhing bskos pa ni 'byung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang ni
319a1('dul ba): na 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sra btung bting ba dang / ma bting ba shes pa'o// bskon/ 
319a2('dul ba): 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ re shig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di
319a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro 'am/ gal te spron des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
319a4('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la dab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun
319a5('dul ba): gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra
319a6('dul ba): brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings
319a7('dul ba): par spron/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur na/ tshe dang
319a8('dul ba): ldan pa rnams las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod
319b1('dul ba): cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas gsol bas sra btung
319b2('dul ba): 'dings pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad lags la/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'ang
319b3('dul ba): yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
319b4('dul ba): la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to// 'di ni gsol da ba'o// ngas dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pas/ 
319b5('dul ba): sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste bkru'o// ba rkyang ngo dra'o// drub bo// kha sbyar ro// chung ngu na khab kyis bsrubs gnyis sam/ gsum yang btsem par bya'o// 
319b6('dul ba): lan gnyis lan gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi de'i chas bai tsA lnga la go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dgasang kho bo sra brkyang 'dings kyis khyed cag so so'i
319b7('dul ba): chos gos sngags phyung shig/ de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang dri dang me tog gis sra brkyang gtor zhing dri zhim po'i bdug pas bdugs nas/ gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+Da
319b8('dul ba): brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o// de nas
320a1('dul ba): rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag dge slong 'di
320a2('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dinges par 'gyur ro// gding ngo // bting ngo // de
320a3('dul ba): skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gnas brtan dgongasu gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dag
320a4('dul ba): 'dun gyis sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings pa bskos pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting lagaso zhes
320a5('dul ba): brjod par bya'o// des legs par bting ngo // shin tu bting / ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa/ de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing / de bzhin
320a6('dul ba): du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo // shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang / phan yon yod pa gang yin de ni bdag gi yin no/ 
320a7('dul ba): zhes brjod par bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thogs te/ chab khung sar ma yin/ snam phyi sar ma yin te/ tshangs bang du 'jug par mi bya'o// 
320a8('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o// gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis kun du spong ba'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par
320b1('dul ba): blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis dpyid zla ra ba zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcwa lnga la yang go bar bya ste/ 
320b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyis/ khyed cag so so'i chos gos rnams byin gyis rlobs shig/ de la rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas
320b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa du zhig gis sra brkyang ma bting lags nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral pa dang / dbyar
320b4('dul ba): phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par ga denas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'o// gzhan yang 'di lnga'i ma bting
320b5('dul ba): ba yin te/ slob pa dang / spo ba sprad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o// btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed mchis la/ 
320b6('dul ba): phan yon ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par bcas pa dang / 
320b7('dul ba): sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i 'o// gzhan yang lnga po 'di dag gi ste spo ba dang / spo ba spyang zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / 
320b8('dul ba): bslab pa byin pa'i 'o// btsun pa du zhig gis rnyed pa yang ma mchis la phan yon yang ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang phyir mi byed pas
321a1('dul ba): gnas nas phyung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar song bam bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / dge 'dun byen chos ma yin pa'i phyogs
321a2('dul ba): pa'i 'o// dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/ chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas/ de dag rimi mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ong
321a3('dul ba): pa legaso// 'ongs pa lags so// jig bde bar spyad dam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyad pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig bdag cag ni chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom mo// tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag
321a4('dul ba): la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/ gal te sra brkyang phyung na khyad la chos dgos kyi bgo ba sha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / 
321a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjesu gnang ste/ chom rkun padag gis bcom pa'i dge slo nga rnams kyi phyir/ sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o// dbyung
321a6('dul ba): ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / 
321a7('dul ba): dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang
321a8('dul ba): po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rku/ 
321b1('dul ba): gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/ sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'bru
321b2('dul ba): pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi srad du/ 
321b3('dul ba): sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang zag
321b4('dul ba): mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dgagis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/ sra brkyang 'byin par
321b5('dul ba): mdzad de/ gang gi slad du cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de bgo bar bya ste// / bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal ba las
321b6('dul ba): chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bge bsha' bya'o// sdom la// rdol pa dang ni sril zos dang // mtha' skor ldan rlon ldan rings dang // gso ma'i seng ras zegs
321b7('dul ba): pa dang / rnyings dang spangs dang dengs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa chos gos rdol pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam
321b8('dul ba): nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal pa dang / chos gos chag btab dang / chos gos lhan pa rlo bos btab pa dang / chos gos lhan rings
322a1('dul ba): can dang / gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos dang / chos gos zegs pa dang / chos gos rnyings pa dang / chos gos spangs pa dang / chos gos dengs pas sra brkyang
322a2('dul ba): gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // sdom la/ brings dang dus ma yin pa dang / gang zag gis ni chos gos gsum// mi rung ba dang ma dras dang // khru lngar mchog mi bya dang / 
322a3('dul ba): bla 'thun min dang mi gding dang // mtshams kyi phyi rol mi ska'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa// btsun pa blings pa'i chos gos gyis sra brkyang
322a4('dul ba): gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa dadus ma lags chos gos dang / gang zag gi snam sbyar/ dang / bla gos dang mthang gos dang / mi rung ba'i chos gro/ 
322a5('dul ba): dang / ma dras pa dang / khru lnga ma mchis pa dang / blo 'thun pa 'am bgyis pa'i chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'dongs pa ma bskos pa dang / mtshams kyi slad rol du blo 'thun
322a6('dul ba): bar bgyis pa'i chos gos kyi sra brkyang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol tu bskos pa'i sra brkyang 'dings pas/ sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // sdom la/ 
322a7('dul ba): dus kyi dang ni zla ba gsum// sar pa dang ni brtags pa nyid// phongs pa dang ni gso ma'i ras// gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum// btsun pa dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra
322a8('dul ba): brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor rung ngo // btsun pa dgung zla gsum 'das nas// dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des sra brkyang gding du rung
322b1('dul ba): lags sam/ nye bar 'khor rung ngo // chos gos sar pa rung ngo // sar pa brtags pa rung ngo // phongs pa'i chos gos rung ngo // gso ma'i seng ras snam sbar mi rung ngo // btsun pa gang zag
322b2('dul ba): gi snam sbyar gyis sra brkyang 'dong su rung lags sam/ gal te dge 'dun la phul gyur na rung // bla gos dang thang gos kyang de bzhin no// sdom la/ gang zag go dang khyim pa dang / khru lnga pa dang
322b3('dul ba): khru lnga'i lhag/ blo 'thun byas pa'i gding ba dang // mtshams kyi nang nyid skye ba'o// btsun pa gang zang gi chos gos kyi sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la
322b4('dul ba): phul bar gyur na'o// khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo // khru lnga pas rung ngo // khru lnga las lhags pas rung ngo // blo 'thun par byas
322b5('dul ba): pa'i sra brkyang gi tshes gos dang sra brkyang 'dings pas rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang du blo 'thun par bya ba sra brkyang gi chos gos kyis rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang 'dings po
322b6('dul ba): bskos pas rung ngo // ma mo brgyad kyi gzhis sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ song ba dang / rdzogs pa dang / nges pa dang / nyams pa dang / thos pa dang / mtshams 'das pa
322b7('dul ba): dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mthara'
322b8('dul ba): can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can dang / mtshams 'das pa dang /  thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no// song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di
323a1('dul ba): lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu/ 
323a2('dul ba): song ba de'i ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas
323a3('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol nas/ phyir 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa'i de'i ni rdzog
323a4('dul ba): papa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// nges pa'i mtha' ngan gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas/ 
323a5('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong sa shing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam dus mas te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam
323a6('dul ba): pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas chos gos ma byas// chos
323a7('dul ba): gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam nas des de
323a8('dul ba): rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang / nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang
323b1('dul ba): bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ongs te chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas/ sra brkyang phyung la nges
323b2('dul ba): dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rje su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 
323b3('dul ba): mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin pa'i phyir 'ong ngam mi 'ong snyam pa las
323b4('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung da ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i
323b5('dul ba): gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams/ kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ongs shing chos gos bya'i/ snyam pa las/ nga'i chos gos rab gang yin pa de thams
323b6('dul ba): cad du chad pa de'i ni/ re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas
323b7('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de yang slar 'ongs shing sra brkyang phyung ba nyam su myong ba de'i ni brgyad pa sra brkyang phyungapa yin no// sdom la/ ma byas pa ni nyi
323b8('dul ba): shu dang / brtsams pa dag ni nyi shu dang // re ba yod pa nyi shu dang // re ba med pa nyi shu yin// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma
324a1('dul ba): zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di sum du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyi 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzog
324a2('dul ba): pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos
324a3('dul ba): gos bya'o// snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra
324a4('dul ba): brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong / zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ des de com zhing de'i
324a5('dul ba): brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong srabaHnga bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma
324a6('dul ba): zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes
324a7('dul ba): thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo // zhes rje su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste ste/ dge slong
324a8('dul ba): sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi pha rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de dar song nas 'di snyam du
324b1('dul ba): sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
324b2('dul ba): chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de der song nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing
324b3('dul ba): chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas// chos gos ma zin par mtshams
324b4('dul ba): kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa da las de der song nas/ rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyam/ das pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 
324b5('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ 
324b6('dul ba): kun su ma rba dbyung la des dge 'du bu pa sra brgya byung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang lags par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rje su yi rang pa byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 
324b7('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag
324b8('dul ba): pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bti
325a1('dul ba): pa'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu sogs/ de slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'ozhes sems la bzhag pa las de ra songs
325a2('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas
325a3('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ des de rtsoms zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i
325a4('dul ba): mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge da srong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar
325a5('dul ba): shing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ dge slong 'thun pa sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun khas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos// thos nas kyang legs par
325a6('dul ba): byung // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos
325a7('dul ba): ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa
325a8('dul ba): de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sras brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas srar
325b1('dul ba): 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 
325b2('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa
325b3('dul ba): las/ nga dar song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ 
325b4('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun
325b5('dul ba): pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang lags par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rje su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di
325b6('dul ba): lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba
325b7('dul ba): las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa 'di'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i
325b8('dul ba): gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar 'ong zhes sems la the tsom za zhin du mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi
326a1('dul ba): 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas
326a2('dul ba): chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tsom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las des da rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha'
326a3('dul ba): can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tsom za bzhin
326a4('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang lags par phyung ngo po// 
326a5('dul ba): shin tu phyung ngo zhes rje su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge srong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos
326a6('dul ba): gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas zhes bya ba thams cad brjod par bya'o// 'on kyang snga ma'i nyi shu la ni chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par zhes bya'o// 'dir ni chos gos ma
326a7('dul ba): zin par zhes bya ba bor te/ chos gos brtsams pa zhes bya ba bcug ste/ rnam pa 'di nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos
326a8('dul ba): gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa'i re ba yod pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i na
326b1('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba yod pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ 
326b2('dul ba): chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zan par slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa'i re ba med par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong 'on kyang chos gos ni byan
326b3('dul ba): snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba med pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'das snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// sdom la/ bya ba dag ni bcu gnyis dang / 
326b4('dul ba): tsal pa dang ni de bzhin gzhan// yul la sngar ni bya ba ste/ gan das la yang ni lnga yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra dbarkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos/ 
326b5('dul ba): ma zin par bya ba zhig la/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas sla ra 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang tshos gos ni
326b6('dul ba): bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtsham
326b7('dul ba): kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung
326b8('dul ba): ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos
327a1('dul ba): bya'o mnyam pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i/ 
327a2('dul ba): gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la
327a3('dul ba): des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo // zhes rje su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba
327a4('dul ba): yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig dal mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chas gos
327a5('dul ba): bya'o snyam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa'i de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// / 
327a6('dul ba): der song nas zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin
327a7('dul ba): no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos mi zin par bya ba zhig gi ched la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam 'on
327a8('dul ba): te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tsom za ba las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 
327b1('dul ba): sems la the tshom za bas rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa'i ji lta bar nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ 
327b2('dul ba): dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par brtsal ba zhig la/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las// 
327b3('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// btsal ba'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma
327b4('dul ba): bzhin du bcu gnyis pa gzhan no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brgya rang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par slar mi 'ong bar yul ltar mtshams kyi phyi rol
327b5('dul ba): du song ba de'i ni/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung bayin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par
327b6('dul ba): yul ltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za ba lags/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos
327b7('dul ba): bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// yul lta
327b8('dul ba): ba'i lnga ji lta bar gnas lta ba'i lnga yang de bzhin no// sra brkyang gi gzhi rdzogas+ho// 'dul ba'i gzhi/ bam po ra brgyad pa// ko'u sham pa'i gzhi'i sdom ni/ koT
328a1('dul ba): sham pa'i ni 'thab dkrol gyi/ dge slong rtsod pa sna tshogs dang / khye'u dang rtsod par byed pa dang / ring po len gyi spod pa dang / ngan spong lan tsa khang pa dang / bsrungs dang
328a2('dul ba): tshal sdug glang chen dang // ma 'gag pas ni de byas dang // mnyan yod du ni zhi bar byas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham bi'i dbyangs ldan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe ko'u/ 
328a3('dul ba): sham pa'i dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo
328a4('dul ba): sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no// ya rangs pa can na/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo
328a5('dul ba): 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ me mo 'dzin pa yin no// de nas yangs
328a6('dul ba): pa can gyi dge slong dus gzhan zhig na/ ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang / ko'u sham bair phyin te/ de lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ ke'u sham bi'i dge slong gi drung du song ste son pa dang / 
328a7('dul ba): phan tshun so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa rnams gtan la dbab par brtsams te/ de na gcig gis smras pa mdo sde 'di
328a8('dul ba): ni'adi skad du gdon par bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni 'di yin no// cig shos kyis smras pa/ mdo sde 'din de skad du gdon par mi bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin no// kho bor
328b1('dul ba): ni rigs so// khyod kyi ni mi rigs so kho bo'i ni 'brel ba yin no// khyod kyi ni 'brel pa ma yin no zhes de gnyis phan tshun du ma mthun par gyur nas/ ko'u sham bi'i dge slong gis yangs pa
328b2('dul ba): can gyi dge slong la klan ka stsal pa lhur len cing 'dug go/ dge 'dun gyis kyang 'di lta bu'i khrimasu bca' ba byas te/ gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'gribs pa dang / nyung ba dang / chu med
328b3('dul ba): pa mthong ba des chus bkang ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba 'am/ dge bskos khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o// gal te bdag nyid kyis ma bkang ngam
328b4('dul ba): dge bskos la ma bsgo bar gyur na/ de ni ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'chagasu gzhug go zhes bya so// ji tsam na khyim bdag
328b5('dul ba): gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs dge slong gi dge 'dun khyi ma du gdugs chod la spyan drangs so// de na dge slong khacag ni zas la dong ngo // kha cig ni 'gro bar cha so// 
328b6('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi dge slong khrus kyi bum pa blangs nas snam phyi sar zhugs pa dang / de'i lhon cig gnas pas rings rings ltar 'ongs nas/ sgra phyung ba mkhan po/ dge slong kha cig
328b7('dul ba): ni zas la dong lag so// kha cig ni 'dong bar chas kyis tshur spon bzhud do// de de dang lhan cig khrus kyi bum pa gnas gcig tu bzhag ste chas so// ko'u sham bi'i dge slong de yang
328b8('dul ba): phyogs de nyid du phyin pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong ngos khrus kyi bum pa blangs te/ gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bsams pa dang / lhan cig gnas pas smras pa/ mkhan
329a1('dul ba): po gar bzung / des smras pa/ bu la ba la ko ru sham pa'i dge slong 'di kun ga 'chol bas khrus kyi bum pa 'gang su 'gro'o// ci 'di thams cad kyis thams cad
329a2('dul ba): stong ngam/ thams cad kyi thams cad du stong pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang chu 'dis chu'i bya ba byed mi nus// mkhan po thams cad du stong par ma gyur pas 'tshal te bdag cag ni mkhan
329a3('dul ba): pa'i phyogs dang dpung dang / grogs bgyed pa lags kyis tshur spyon bzhud do// des de nyid du bzhag nas de dang lhan cig tu dong ngo // ko'u sham bi'i dge slong gis mthong nas/ khrus
329a4('dul ba): kyi bum pa de la mnam so// de nas mi bzod pa skyes te/ ma dardol to zhes byas nas khrus kyi bum pa bkang ste chu'i dbya ba byas nas song ngo // de nas zan zos nas dge slong gi dge
329a5('dul ba): 'dun gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / dge slong rnams la bsgrags pa tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa can gyi dge slong ngas/ dge 'dun gyi nang khrims dral to// de nas rgan rims
329a6('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du gdung pa byas nas rims kyis de'i drung du son pa dang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa skabs phye shig/ ltung ba ris lnga la skabs phye'o// khyod la de ring lhung ba byung gis/ ltung ba yang
329a7('dul ba): slar chos bzhin du gyis shig/ ltung ba ma mthong ngo // dge 'dun gyis khrimasu bca' ba gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'gribs pa dang / chu nyung ba dang / chu meng pa mthong na bdag nyid
329a8('dul ba): kyis chus bkang ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba 'am/ dge bskos la tshe dang ldan pa khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bkang
329b1('dul ba): la dge bskos la yang ma bskon de ni mgus pa yin te/ mgus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba chag su bzhug go zhes bcas pa ma yin nam/ des smras pa de bcang stong pa
329b2('dul ba): ni ma yin no// stong par ma gyur kyang rung ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byang mi nuso// de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// ke'u sham bi'i dge slong ni ke'u sham bin gnyug ma pa dang / 'khor mang po pa yin
329b3('dul ba): bas/ des de la nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas/ da na ko'u sham pi'i dge slong rnams dang / 'thab dkrol dang / 
329b4('dul ba): mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta nga ste/ ltung ba byung zhe 'am ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe 'am gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no
329b5('dul ba): zhes gang lang ltung ba dang / ltung ba med pa dang / gnas nas dbyung ba dang / gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin pa la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa ni chos ma yin
329b6('dul ba): ba'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas phyung ngo zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong
329b7('dul ba): dang gnas nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas byung ba'i rjesu phyogs pa'i yang rjesu phyog pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong
329b8('dul ba): dag khyed 'thab dkrol dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong
330a1('dul ba): ma bzhin du ste bden nam/ btsun pa mang lagaso// dge slong dag 'thab dkrol ma byed cig/ mtshang ma 'dru shig/ ma rtsod cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ gzhan yang ngas gnas
330a2('dul ba): nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun du smad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong gnas nas phyung bas 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnon
330a3('dul ba): pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin la de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa pha rol gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin te
330a4('dul ba): gal te bdag gis ltung ba chos bzhin slar mabyams na dge 'dun 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag
330a5('dul ba): gis ltung ba phyir chos bzhin du bya'o// gnas nas phyung ba'i// dge slong gi kun tu spong ba'i chos ji ltar bcas pa ba zhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal
330a6('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas phyung ba'i rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rdza su phyogs pa'i yang
330a7('dul ba): rje su phyogs pa rnams bzeng bstod nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rje su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjesu phyogs pa'i yang
330a8('dul ba): rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'thab dkrol dang mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ 
330b1('dul ba): lhung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bden nam/ btsun pa mang lag so// dge slong dag 'thab dkrol ma byed cig/ 
330b2('dul ba): mtshang ma 'brulas phar lam 'gyed cig/ gzhan yang ngas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gis 'di snyam du sems bskyed/ 
330b3('dul ba): par bya'o// gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang // 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ 'di'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po
330b4('dul ba): yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul dab 'dzin pa/ me mo 'dzin pa yin gyis gal te bdag gis de la mi 'dod pa glengs sam dran par byas na/ des
330b5('dul ba): na dge 'dun 'thab dkrol dang / brtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru pa dang 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis 'di la mi 'dod pa gleng bar mi bya dran par mi
330b6('dul ba): bya'o// gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
330b7('dul ba): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa 'byung bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la/ 
330b8('dul ba): yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas
331a1('dul ba): nas phyung ba'i rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa'i yang rje su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka'
331a2('dul ba): stsal to// dge slong dag khyed la ngas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso
331a3('dul ba): sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad lagaso// dge slong dag 'thab dkrol ma byed cig/ mtshang ma 'bra shig/ ma rtsod cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dog 'thab dkrol
331a4('dul ba): dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing / gnas nas las su bya ba gang dag yin pa gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dang gsol ba dang / gsol pa dang / gnyis dang / 
331a5('dul ba): gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byas pa rnams ma byas pa dang 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing dge slong dag khyed dang dge slong de rnams dang / khyed du tha dad du gnas par 'gyur ro// 
331a6('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag gnyis po 'di dag ni tha dad par gnas pa yin te/ gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnasu bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis
331a7('dul ba): bzhag pa'o// bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dge slong rnams 'thab dkrol dang mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa
331a8('dul ba): byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na ched du bsams te/ chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyog su 'gro ba ste/ de lta bu ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad po'i gnas
331b1('dul ba): bzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / brir mi phyed pa dang / sdig pa can gyi lta bar song
331b2('dul ba): ba mi 'dor ba gnas nas dbyung ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyis chos kyis yin no// dge slong dag gnyis po 'di dag ni 'thun par gnas pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na gang zhig bdag nyid kyis
331b3('dul ba): bdag nyid 'thun pa gnasu bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o// bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid 'thun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dge
331b4('dul ba): slong rnams 'thab dkrol dang mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pad/ nga / 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du/ gnas pa ni/ ched du bsams te/ chos ma yin pa'i
331b5('dul ba): phyogs nas chos kyi phyogasu 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid 'thun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta
331b6('dul ba): ste/ dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa dang / phyir mi byed pa dang / sdig can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba dang / gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa'i ni dge 'dun
331b7('dul ba): gyis chos kyis yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i
331b8('dul ba): rje su phyogs pa'i yang rje su phyogs pa rnams gzengs bstod nas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byon pa'i rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas
332a1('dul ba): nas 'byin pa'i rjesu phyogs pa'i yang rjesu phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dgangs de skad ces bka' stsal
332a2('dul ba): na/ 'on kyang khyed 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun
332a3('dul ba): ba mad lags so zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / cod pa dpo med pa byung bas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar
332a4('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o// khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs dpa dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa la sa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das/ 
332a5('dul ba): ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs te/ bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhug
332a6('dul ba): shing bsod snyoms kyi skra skal nod par mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba nas skabs 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ rdzas kyis
332a7('dul ba): bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de na rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams zas kyi phyir khyim gyi nang du
332a8('dul ba): zhugs pa dang / 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am ltung ba ma byung ngo zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os
332b1('dul ba): pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ da ni phan tshun rdeg pa la zhug so// de nas dge slong bsod snyoms nod pas bsod snyoms khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
332b2('dul ba): bsod snyoms mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ spyan sngar 'dug go/ chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
332b3('dul ba): ni bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod pa'i kha zas kyis
332b4('dul ba): tshim par byas sam/ zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ bcom lda ngan 'das kyis bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par
332b5('dul ba): dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong jig dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas bsod pas tshis par byas sam/ btsun pa mad par dge slong gi 'dun la zhal zas bsod pas tshim par
332b6('dul ba): bgyis na 'on kyang rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams sdum pa'i nang du 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhes
332b7('dul ba): 'am/ zhes bya ba nas/ gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// da ni phan tshun du rdegs pa la zhugs lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas kyi bye ba mdzad nas
332b8('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las
333a1('dul ba): bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
333a2('dul ba): khyed kha zas la khyim du zhugs pa na 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhes 'am zhes bya nas ngan phan tshun du rdeg pa la
333a3('dul ba): zhug so zhes bya ba'i bar du bden nam/ btsun pa mad lagaso// dge slong dag 'thab dkrol ma byed cig/ mtshang ma 'bru shig/ ma brtsod cig la 'gyed cig/ gzhan yang ngas rgol ba dang phyir rgol
333a4('dul ba): pa'i dge slong rnams khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas gang du
333a5('dul ba): lus kyi kun du spod pa'i rung ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i skabs mi 'byung bar bstan par chad yod par 'dug par bya'o// rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba/ dge slong rnams kyis khang
333a6('dul ba): nang du zhugs nas kun du spod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs na/ 
333a7('dul ba): 'on kyang dge slong rnams 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas
333a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'thab dkrol ma byed cig/ 'tshang ma 'bru shig/ ma brtsod cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag khyed cag/ 
333b1('dul ba): 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung bas gnas nas rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar
333b2('dul ba): bya ba'i gnas 'di med do// dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab dkrol med pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang / 'gyed pa med par gyur cing gnas nas rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba
333b3('dul ba): ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul ba las 'dul bar bya ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar ni bar bya ba'i gnas 'di yod do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul ka sha'i rgyal po tshangs sprin zhes bya ba
333b4('dul ba): dang / yul sa la'i rgyal po ring po len gnyis phan tshun rtsod dpar gyur te/ rgyas par ni lung bar ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i le'u las ring po len gyi mdo 'byung ba bzhin
333b5('dul ba): no// de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces/ tshangs sbyin rga ba sdug bsngal te/ nor rnams yongasu gtugs pa dang / gnyen rnams
333b6('dul ba): kyang ni ma mthong dang / yul gzhan shi ba sdug bsngal lo// zhes bka' stsal pa zhig kyang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ tshig mi
333b7('dul ba): mthun la phyogs mnyam yang // 'di gtso min zhes sems byed pa// dge 'dun dbye bar gyur na go/ mthu chung cung zad ces mi bsam/ srog chags rus pa gcog pa dang // rta dang ba
333b8('dul ba): lang nor phrogs dang // yul 'khor phung bar byas rnams kyang // 'dum par 'gyur ba nyid yod na// chos 'di rnam par shes gyur pa// khyed cag ci yi phyir mi 'gyur// spyod yul
334a1('dul ba): ston par byed pa'i gsung // chags la zlog pa lhur len pa// brtags na mkhas par snang ba ni// gang la rtsod pa de ma shes// gzhan dag bdag 'di la ni/ brtson
334a2('dul ba): zhes bya bar mi shes kyi// gang dag gis ni 'di shes pa// de la gzu bo mi dgos so// bdag spros bdag la kha byas dang // bdag rgyal bdag ni 'pham gyur pa// de la gang dag kho na 'dzin pa/ 
334a3('dul ba): de dag sha kho na zhi mi 'gyur// bdag spros bdag la kha byas dang // bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa// de la gang dag khon mi 'dzin// de dag sha kho na zhi bar 'gyur// khon du 'dzin
334a4('dul ba): bas sha khon dag/ 'dir ni gzhar yang zhi mi gyur// brko dad pas sha kho na zhi 'gyur ba// 'di ni g.yung drung chos yin no// khon du 'dzin pas sha kho na nam yang zhi mi
334a5('dul ba): 'gyur// khon du 'dzin med rnams kyis sha kho na zhi bar 'gyur// kho na la chags pa lus can rnams la phan mi 'gyur// / de lta bas na mkhas pa 'khon du 'dzin mi byed// gal
334a6('dul ba): te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan cig spyod pa dang // legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par gyur na ni// zag par 'gyur ba thams cad zil gyis mnan byas nas// de dang yid dga'
334a7('dul ba): dran dang ldan zhing smad par bya// gol te grogs po 'gras skong lhan cig sprod pa dang // legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par ma gyur na// rgyal pos yul 'khor rgya chen spangs
334a8('dul ba): par gyur pa bzhino// gcig por 'dug par bya zhing sdig pa rnams mi bya// gal te btsal te bdag 'dra ba 'am// lhag par rnyed par ma gyur na// byis pa stongs mor 'gyur med pas/ 
334b1('dul ba): gcig pur spyad pa brtan par spyad// gcig pu spyod pa legs 'gyur gyi// byis pas bstangs pa legs min pas// ma tang dgon pa'i glang chen ltar// sems las bsrungs te gcig
334b2('dul ba): pus spang // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ko'u sham bi'i dge slong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rje lags/ bde bar ga
334b3('dul ba): pa ni chos kyi rje lags na/ 'di rnams bdag cag la tshig ngan pa dang / mi snyan pa mchin/ bdag cag gis de rnams la ci'i slad du bzod par bgyi lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
334b4('dul ba): kyis dge slong de rnams kyi spyod tshul dang / log par sgrub pa des / thugs mi dgyes shig/ thugs la ma bab pas de nying nas rdzu 'phrul gyi na mkha' la gshegs te mnyan
334b5('dul ba): yod gang na bder rgyu zhing gshegaso// rim gyis rgyu zhing ga shegs pa dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan mo/ dkyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
334b6('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das der gshegs pa dang / ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams dang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'di lta bu'i spyod lam du gyur to/ snga
334b7('dul ba): droni zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la 'jug/ zas kyi 'og tu ni sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed par gyur to// de rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa des lo bcu gnyis
334b8('dul ba): 'das so// ko'u sham pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'dun khang du 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa shes ldan dag bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la na bza'
335a1('dul ba): chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gzim cha dang / sun spyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dbul bar shin tu dang na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod yul
335a2('dul ba): du lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du spangs te/ da dung yang ma byon no// kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs par ga la 'gyur/ 'di na da ltar ko'u shom pa'i
335a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi tshul dang / sprod pa dang / log par sgrub pa 'di lta bur byed de snga dro zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la zhugs la/ zas kyi 'og tu sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyid do// kha cig gis/ 
335a4('dul ba): smras pa/ shes ldan dag de rnams la/ nyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang bdag cag gis lan te/ bdag cag gis de rnams la bsod snyoms byin pa 'am/ tshig smras pas
335a5('dul ba): so// chur bdag cag gis khrims shig bcas la gzhag ste/ sus kyang de rnams la bsod snyoms mi sbyin zhing tshi ga kyang mi smra'o zhes de rnams kyis khrimasu bcas nas
335a6('dul ba): bzhag go// de nas phyi de nyid ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / sus kyang ma smos la bsod snyoms kyang ma byin te/ de rnams ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus
335a7('dul ba): pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de ltar bkrus pa nyid kyis sgor byung ste/ bsod snyoms gcig kyang ma rnyed do// de nas de rnams 'dus nas ko'u sham pa'i bram ze dang khyim
335a8('dul ba): bdag rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dgare shig nor zad par gyur na bsod snyoms mi ster ba ni rigs na/ bdag cag gis nyes pa ci byas na tshig kyang mi ster/ de rnams kyis
335b1('dul ba): smras pa/ gang dag gis tshul dang spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pas ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs lam bab na/ steng gi na mkha' las gshegs te/ lo bcu gnyis 'das na
335b2('dul ba): da dung yang slar ma gshegs pa khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par bdag nyid khas 'che'am/ de rnams cad smra bar 'khod nas/ de rnams kyi drung nas dong ste smras pa/ 
335b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa de rnams kyis bdag cag brgyad pa ni thog du bab ste/ gang zhig sa la 'gyel pa de de nyid las brten te ldang bas mdor na mnyan yod du dong la/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi
335b4('dul ba): dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol lo// de nas ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams de nyid kyi nub mo 'das pas/ lhung bzedad dang chos gos khyer te/ ko'u sham bir ma zhugs par
335b5('dul ba): mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dag/ 'bos/ ko'u sha ma bi'i dge slong 'thab dkrol byed pa 'tshang 'dra bar byed pa/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par
335b6('dul ba): byed pa'i rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos nas/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs phyung bar bgyis te 'dir gshegs pas de dag ngo tsha med pas mtho ba tsam pa'i
335b7('dul ba): phyir/ bdag cag la gleng bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan
335b8('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
336a1('dul ba): btsun pa bdag gis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong 'thab dkrol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa brtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid
336a2('dul ba): pa rnams 'dir mchi'o zhes thos lags/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs phyung bar bgyis te 'dir byon pa de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas mtho ba tsam pa nyid du bdag cag la gleng bar
336a3('dul ba): bgying dran par bgyid na/ de rnams la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ kun dga' bo de dag la dge slong rnams kyis lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig bstan pa ma gtogs par
336a4('dul ba): gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta ba dar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya/ gal te bdag ca ga ni rgan na ci'i phyir gnas mal gyi tha ma sprin zhes smra na/ 
336a5('dul ba): gang dag gi tshul dang / sprod pa dang / log par sgrub pas/ ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab nas 'dir gshegs shing khyod shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong
336a6('dul ba): yin par bdag nyid khas 'che'am/ ston pa thugs rje can das 'di gnang ba nyid kyang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyu ro zhes smros shig/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong
336a7('dul ba): 'thab dkrol byed pa mtshang 'dra ba byed pa rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed pa rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te song la de rnams la bdag
336a8('dul ba): gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bo phyag byas te phyogs
336b1('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la skye dgu'i brags so go'ung mis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong 'thab dkrol bgying pa/ mcha
336b2('dul ba): 'dra ba bgyid pa/ rtson par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o// zhes thos lags na/ bdag gi de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ go'u ta mi khyod kyis
336b3('dul ba): ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams la 'khor gyi gtso bo yin pas mthong ma thag tu stan dor ba ma gtogs par gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya ba lte bar mi bya// rnam par blta bar
336b4('dul ba): mi bya'o// khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis ko'u sham ba'i dge slong 'thab dkrol byed pa/ mtshang 'dra bar byed bu/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi
336b5('dul ba): byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang 'di snyam/ sa du sems te song la bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar/ bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam du bsams
336b6('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim
336b7('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong 'thab dkrol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ 
336b8('dul ba): rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o zhes thos lags na bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ khyim bdag khyod kyis ko'u sham
337a1('dul ba): ba'i dge slong rnams la sbyin pa dang / mi mthun pa med pas bsod snyoms ni sprin gyi gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya rnam par blta
337a2('dul ba): bar mi bya'o// de nas ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas der lhung bzed dang / cho so gos mkhosu phab ste/ rkang pa bkrus nas dris pa/ gnas mal 'gyed pa su yin/ 
337a3('dul ba): phyag tsang dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa kun
337a4('dul ba): dga' bo bdag cag la gnas mal byin cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun da gra' bos de rnams la lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig/ bstan par brtsams pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe
337a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag rgan pa yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag la gnas mal tha ma dag sprin/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong yin par shes bya
337a6('dul ba): ba nas/ de yang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rnams yi chad cing sdug bsngal bas mtshan mo 'da' bar byed do// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong
337a7('dul ba): gis nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su rang gi rgyud la brtags nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag 'thab dkol dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ 
337a8('dul ba): ltung ba 'byung ngo zhe 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba bdag ni ltung ba ma yin te/ ltung ba byung ba
337b1('dul ba): yin zhing gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma yin te/ gnas dbyung ba yin la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa de yang chos dang 'thun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa bzhag par mi 'os pa phyung gis
337b2('dul ba): ma la bdag gis 'thun pa'i sdums bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ nang par sngar langs te gnas nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang gnas nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa'i
337b3('dul ba): yang rje su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang gnas nas phyung ba'i rjesu phyogs pa'i yang rje su phyogs pa rnams la
337b4('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud ga/ brtags na 'di snyam du sems te/ gleng gzhi gang
337b5('dul ba): las 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe'am/ 
337b6('dul ba): gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba/ bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba yin te/ ltung ba byung ba yin zhing / gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma yin te/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin la/ gnas nas drung
337b7('dul ba): ba gang yin pa yang chos dang 'thun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa bzhag par mi 'os pas phyung gis ma la bdag gis 'thun par snga mas bya'o// snyam na khyed cag cig smra/ de rnams kyis smras
337b8('dul ba): pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes phrogs/ 
338a1('dul ba): pa'i yang rjes phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes phrogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin par/ 
338a2('dul ba): rje su phyogs pa'i yang rje su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas
338a3('dul ba): nas 'byin pa'i rje su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags na 'di snyam du sems te/ 
338a4('dul ba): gleng gzhi gang las 'thab dkrol dang mtshang 'dru ba byung / des zhes bya ba nas/ 'dum par sdums bya bar sin das na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ khyed cag ci smra/ 
338a5('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas na sa phyung ba'i rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas
338a6('dul ba): nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa'i yang rje su phyogs pa rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas
338a7('dul ba): nas 'byin pa'i rje su phyogs pa'i yang rje su phyogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
338a8('dul ba): gcig tu 'khyod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khyod nas/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir mdang sum nam gyi
338b1('dul ba): cha smad kyi dus su bdag gi ma thu la brtags na 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba nas 'thun par snga mas bgyi bar zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag gis dge slong 'di dag thams cad
338b2('dul ba): la 'thun par bgyi ba spro bar bgyis lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legaso legaso// gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 
338b3('dul ba): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan la gnas pa rnams kyi snga mas byed pa de ni/ bsod nams mang po tshad med pa grangs med pa gzhal du med par
338b4('dul ba): skyed par 'gyur ro// gang 'ga' zhig gis skra dum bu brgyar dbatubs pa log dang shos sbyor ba byed pa de bzhin du gang zhi dag dge slong rnams 'thab dkrol dang zhes bya ba nas 'thun
338b5('dul ba): bar snga mas byed pa ni bsod nams mang po tshad med pa grang / sa med pa gzhal du med pa skyed par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag 'on kyang ngas gnas
338b6('dul ba): nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la dbyung ba gsol bar bya'o// gsol ba 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas/ 
338b7('dul ba): mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshegs 'thun par gyur pa dang / rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin
338b8('dul ba): du gus pa dang / bcas pas bdud pa byas la rgan rims kyis mdun du thal mo sbar te/ cog tsag por 'dug la 'di skad ces dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag gi
339a1('dul ba): gling gzhi gang las 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dru dang / rjortsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung babyung ngo zhes 'am ltung ba ma byung ngo zhes bgyi ba 'am/ 
339a2('dul ba): gnas nas dbyung ba lagaso zhes 'am/ gnas nas phyung ba ma lags zhes bgyi ba/ bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te ltung ba byung ba lags shing gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma lags

339a5('dul ba): ba bzhin dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin phyir bgyi'o zhe sa de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// / de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las byal
339a6('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du sol tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab dkroli dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/

339a8('dul ba): byung ba lags shing gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma lags te/ gnas nas dbyung ba gang lags pa yang chos dang 'thun pa'i las mi 'khrugs par bzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/ 
339b1('dul ba): gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong mang 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig/

339b3('dul ba): gzhi gang las 'thab dkrol byung ba zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gnas nas phyung ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di
339b4('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams la/ sa gang dag gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'dis/ des bgyi ba 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ 
339b5('dul ba): gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun gyis bzod
339b6('dul ba): cang gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyung lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge slong dag ngas dge slong dbyung
339b7('dul ba): ba'i las byas pa'i kun du spod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dbyung ba'i las byas pa'i dge slong gis/ dge 'dun las 'thun pa gsol bar bya'o// gsol ba 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas
339b8('dul ba): mal bshams la gar+b+he brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshegs shing 'thun por gyur pa dang / zhes bya ba nas thugs ba
340a1('dul ba): ba can zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlos// de nas dge slong cig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa
340a2('dul ba): rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab dkol dang mtshang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byungango zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo

340a6('dul ba): mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las 'thun pa gsel na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 
340a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'thun pa stsol bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni ngage 'dun btsun pa rnams
340a8('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di gleng gzhi gang las 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang / bgyed pa byung na 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'du/ 
340b1('dul ba): gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'thun pa sul lags ste/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin
340b2('dul ba): to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i las byas zin pa gang yin pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis 'thun pa sbyin par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// ngas dge
340b3('dul ba): 'dun gyis 'thun pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge 'dun gyis 'thun pa byin pa'i dge slong gis go so slong gsol ba'o// gsol pa ni 'di ltar bya
340b4('dul ba): ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'thun pa stsal pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las 'thun pa'i gso slong gsol na/ dge 'dun
340b5('dul ba): btsun pa rnams thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse bas nyebar bzung ste/ 'thun pa srul ba'i dge slong bad/ ga ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'thun pa'i gso sbyong stsal du
340b6('dul ba): gsol/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas zhes bya ba'o bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du/ 
340b7('dul ba): gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ zhes bya ba nas dge
340b8('dul ba): 'dun gyis thun pa sprul pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ dge 'dun las 'thun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun
341a1('dul ba): gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'thun pa stsal ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis 'thun pa'i gso sbyong stsol bar mdzad do// 'di ni
341a2('dul ba): gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab dkrol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di//
